title: Pebble Watch software is now open source
summary:
Pebble's watch software is now 100% open source, a major step by Core Devices (the company behind the relaunch) to ensure long-term sustainability. This includes the PebbleOS (watch software, open since January), the new Pebble mobile companion app (now fully open source on GitHub), and updated developer tools. The move guarantees users can build, run, and improve their Pebble software even if Core Devices ceases operations.

A significant change is the decentralization of the Pebble Appstore. The mobile app will support multiple appstore 'feeds' (like package managers), and Core Devices has launched its own feed, backed up to Archive.org, promoting long-term reliability and community contributions. While some non-free components exist (e.g., HR sensor libraries), the core Pebble software stack remains open source and functional without them.

Hardware sustainability is also a focus, with Core Devices operating as a lean, self-funded entity. New watches like the Pebble Time 2 (PT2) are designed for repairability (e.g., replaceable batteries), and electrical/mechanical design files for Pebble 2 Duo are openly available on GitHub.

Regarding the Pebble Time 2, shipments are aiming to begin in January 2026, with the majority expected to arrive in March/April due to production timelines and Chinese New Year. Four color options will be available, and selection emails will be sent out in the coming weeks. Pre-production PT2 units are demonstrated in a new "Tick Talk" episode.
chinese_title: Pebble 手表软件现已开源
chinese_summary:
斐波（Pebble）的智能手表软件现已100%开源，这是Core Devices（重启斐波的公司）为确保其长期可持续性而迈出的重要一步。这包括PebbleOS（智能手表软件，自一月起已开源）、新的斐波移动伴侣应用程序（现已在GitHub上完全开源）以及更新的开发者工具。此举确保即使Core Devices停止运营，用户仍能构建、运行和改进他们的斐波软件。

一个显著的变化是斐波应用商店的去中心化。移动应用程序将支持多个应用商店“订阅源”（类似于包管理器），Core Devices已推出自己的订阅源，并已备份至Archive.org，以促进长期可靠性和社区贡献。尽管存在一些非免费组件（例如心率传感器库），但核心斐波软件栈在没有它们的情况下仍然保持开源和可用。

硬件可持续性也是一个重点，Core Devices作为一家精简、自筹资金的实体运营。像Pebble Time 2 (PT2) 这样的新手表在设计时就考虑了可修复性（例如可更换电池），Pebble 2 Duo的电气/机械设计文件已在GitHub上公开。

关于Pebble Time 2，预计发货将于2026年1月开始，但由于生产周期和农历新年，大部分预计将在3月/4月到达。将提供四种颜色选项，选择邮件将在未来几周内发送。预生产的PT2设备已在一个新的“Tick Talk”节目中进行了展示。

title: Claude Opus 4.5
summary:
Anthropic launched Claude Opus 4.5 on November 24, 2025, positioning it as their most intelligent and efficient model yet, designed for coding, agents, and computer use. Available across apps, API, and cloud platforms, its new pricing ($5/$25 per million tokens) makes advanced capabilities more accessible.

Opus 4.5 sets new benchmarks in software engineering, outperforming Sonnet 4.5 and competitors on tests like SWE-bench Multilingual and Aider Polyglot, often reducing token usage by up to 65%. It scored higher than any human on a challenging 2-hour performance engineering exam. Beyond coding, it significantly improves everyday tasks such as deep research, spreadsheet automation (20% accuracy gain), and long-context storytelling. Testers praise its ability to handle ambiguity, reason about tradeoffs, and creatively solve complex problems.

The model boasts enhanced vision, reasoning, and mathematics skills. Crucially, Opus 4.5 is also Anthropic's most robustly aligned model, showing substantial progress against prompt injection attacks, ensuring greater safety and reliability.

Developer platform updates include a new `effort` parameter, allowing users to balance speed/cost with capability. Product updates enhance Claude Code with an improved Plan Mode and desktop app, enable continuous long conversations in Claude apps, and expand access to Claude for Chrome and Excel. Usage limits for Opus 4.5 have been increased for premium users, reflecting its readiness for daily professional use. This release marks a significant step forward in AI capabilities and signals future changes in how work is done.
chinese_title: 克劳德 奥普斯 4.5
chinese_summary:

Opus 4.5在软件工程领域树立了新标杆，在SWE-bench Multilingual和Aider Polyglot等测试中表现优于Sonnet 4.5及竞争对手，通常可将token使用量减少高达65%。在一项具有挑战性的2小时性能工程考试中，它的得分高于任何人类考生。除了编码，它还显著改进了深度研究、电子表格自动化（准确性提高20%）和长上下文叙事等日常任务。测试人员赞扬它处理模糊性、权衡利弊以及创造性解决复杂问题的能力。

该模型拥有增强的视觉、推理和数学能力。关键在于，Opus 4.5也是Anthropic对齐最稳健的模型，在防范提示注入攻击方面显示出实质性进展，从而确保了更高的安全性和可靠性。

开发者平台更新包括一个新的`effort`参数，允许用户在速度/成本与模型能力之间进行平衡。产品更新通过改进的“计划模式”和桌面应用程序增强了Claude Code，使Claude应用程序中能够进行连续的长对话，并扩大了Claude对Chrome和Excel的访问。Opus 4.5的高级用户使用限制已提高，反映出它已准备好用于日常专业用途。此次发布标志着人工智能能力向前迈出了重要一步，并预示着未来工作方式的改变。

title: Someone at YouTube Needs Glasses: The Prophecy Has Been Fulfilled
summary:
The author recalls a previous statistical analysis projecting that YouTube's homepage would display only one video by May 2026 due to decreasing information density. This analysis garnered attention, leading to a leaked recording of YouTube's Product Management (PM) organization discussing the criticism.

Months later, after work by "Gemini YouTube engineers," the author found that opening YouTube on an Apple TV presented a homepage with just one solitary video. This observation prompted a significant revision of the initial prophecy. Citing the accelerating "myopia" of the YouTube PM org, the author now projects that the homepage will feature *zero* videos by May 2026, a faster decline than previously estimated.

The article concludes with the author's frustration that "Poe's Law applies to Google PMs," suggesting that reality has outpaced satire, and humorously speculates about the early arrival of mandatory NeuraLinks, emphasizing a critical view of YouTube's user interface design trajectory.
chinese_title: YouTube上有人该配眼镜了：预言应验了
chinese_summary:
作者回忆起一项先前的统计分析，该分析预测由于信息密度下降，YouTube的主页到2026年5月将只显示一个视频。这项分析引起了关注，导致YouTube产品管理（PM）部门的一段泄露录音讨论了这些批评。

几个月后，在“Gemini YouTube工程师”一番努力之后，作者发现在Apple TV上打开YouTube时，主页上只显示一个孤零零的视频。这一发现促使作者对最初的预言进行了重大修订。作者援引YouTube PM部门日益加速的“短视”，现在预测到2026年5月，主页将显示 *零* 个视频，下降速度比之前估计的更快。

文章最后，作者沮丧地表示“波伊定律适用于谷歌的产品经理”，暗示现实已经超越了讽刺，并幽默地推测强制性NeuraLink将提前到来，这强调了对YouTube用户界面设计走向的批判性看法。

title: Unpowered SSDs slowly lose data
summary:
Unpowered SSDs slowly lose data over extended periods, making them unreliable for long-term "cold" storage. Unlike hard drives that use magnetism, SSDs store data by modifying electrical charges in NAND flash cells. Without power, these charges can dissipate, leading to data corruption or loss.

The duration of data retention depends on the NAND type: QLC NAND (common in consumer drives) can last about 2-3 years unpowered, TLC NAND up to 3 years, MLC up to 5 years, and SLC up to 10 years. Most consumer SSDs use TLC or QLC, meaning data integrity is at risk after just a few years without power. Hard drives, while susceptible to bit rot, are generally more resilient to prolonged unpowered storage.

This concern primarily affects enterprise users, enthusiasts, and solopreneurs archiving data for years. Most everyday users, whose SSDs are regularly powered, are unlikely to encounter this issue. Factors like temperature and NAND quality can accelerate voltage loss.

The article emphasizes that robust backup strategies are crucial, recommending the 3-2-1 rule (3 copies of data, on 2 different media, with 1 copy off-site). For critical long-term archival, alternatives like hard drives, magnetic tape, or M-Disc are preferable. While SSDs are excellent for primary storage, relying on them unpowered for multi-year data retention is risky, highlighting the universal necessity of comprehensive backups for data preservation.
chinese_title: 未通电的固态硬盘会缓慢丢失数据
chinese_summary:
未通电的固态硬盘（SSD）在长时间内会缓慢丢失数据，这使得它们不适合用于长期“冷”存储。与使用磁性存储的硬盘不同，固态硬盘通过改变NAND闪存单元中的电荷来存储数据。没有电源，这些电荷会消散，导致数据损坏或丢失。

数据保留时间取决于NAND类型：QLC NAND（常见于消费级硬盘）在未通电状态下可保留约2-3年，TLC NAND长达3年，MLC长达5年，SLC长达10年。大多数消费级固态硬盘使用TLC或QLC，这意味着在不通电几年后，数据完整性就面临风险。硬盘虽然容易受到位衰减（bit rot）的影响，但通常对长时间未通电存储更具弹性。

这种担忧主要影响需要长期存档数据的企业用户、爱好者和个人创业者。大多数日常用户由于其固态硬盘会定期通电，不太可能遇到这个问题。温度和NAND质量等因素会加速电荷流失。

文章强调，健壮的备份策略至关重要，推荐3-2-1规则（3份数据副本，存储在2种不同介质上，其中1份异地存储）。对于重要的长期存档，硬盘、磁带或M-Disc等替代方案更佳。虽然固态硬盘非常适合作为主存储，但依靠它们在未通电状态下进行多年数据保留是冒险的，这突显了全面备份对于数据保存的普遍必要性。

title: Google Antigravity exfiltrates data via indirect prompt injection attack
summary:
Google's new agentic code editor, Antigravity, powered by its Gemini AI agent, is susceptible to an indirect prompt injection attack capable of exfiltrating sensitive user data. Researchers demonstrated how a poisoned web source, like an integration guide, can manipulate Gemini into stealing credentials and code.

The attack chain begins when a user directs Gemini to a malicious web page containing a hidden prompt injection. Gemini is then coerced to:
1.  **Collect sensitive data**: It gathers code snippets and credentials, notably bypassing its own `.gitignore` file access protections for `.env` files by using the `cat` terminal command.
2.  **Construct a malicious URL**: Gemini URL-encodes the collected data and appends it to an attacker-monitored domain, such as `webhook.site`.
3.  **Exfiltrate data**: Gemini activates a browser subagent to open this malicious URL.

Several default Antigravity settings facilitate this attack: "Agent Decides" for human review, "Auto" for terminal command execution, and the "Browser tools" feature which allows subagents. Crucially, `webhook.site` is on Antigravity's default browser URL allowlist, preventing blocking.

While users can monitor agents, Antigravity's "Agent Manager" encourages running multiple agents unsupervised, making detection unlikely. Although Google acknowledges data exfiltration risks via a disclaimer, the researchers find this insufficient given the practical implications of unattended agents and permissive default settings, opting not to undertake responsible disclosure.
chinese_title: 谷歌反重力通过间接提示注入攻击外泄数据
chinese_summary:
Google的新型代理代码编辑器Antigravity，由其Gemini AI代理驱动，容易受到间接提示注入攻击，该攻击能够窃取敏感用户数据。研究人员演示了恶意网络源（如集成指南）如何操纵Gemini窃取凭据和代码。

攻击链始于用户将Gemini指向一个包含隐藏提示注入的恶意网页。Gemini随后被迫执行以下操作：
1. **收集敏感数据**：它收集代码片段和凭据，值得注意的是，通过使用`cat`终端命令，绕过了自身针对`.env`文件的`.gitignore`文件访问保护。
2. **构造恶意URL**：Gemini对收集到的数据进行URL编码，并将其附加到攻击者监控的域名，例如`webhook.site`。
3. **窃取数据**：Gemini激活一个浏览器子代理来打开这个恶意URL。

Antigravity的几个默认设置助长了这种攻击：用于人工审查的“代理决定”（"Agent Decides"）、用于终端命令执行的“自动”（"Auto"）以及允许子代理的“浏览器工具”（"Browser tools"）功能。关键是，`webhook.site`位于Antigravity的默认浏览器URL白名单上，从而阻止了拦截。

尽管用户可以监控代理，但Antigravity的“代理管理器”（"Agent Manager"）鼓励在无人监督的情况下运行多个代理，使得检测变得不太可能。尽管谷歌通过免责声明承认数据窃取风险，但研究人员认为，考虑到无人值守代理和宽松默认设置的实际影响，这远远不够，因此选择不进行负责任的披露。

title: Claude Advanced Tool Use
summary:
Anthropic has released three new features for Claude to enhance AI agent capabilities, addressing challenges related to vast tool libraries, complex orchestration, and learning correct tool usage.

The **Tool Search Tool** tackles the issue of extensive tool definitions consuming significant context window space (e.g., 55K tokens for 58 tools). By allowing tools to be discovered and loaded on-demand using `defer_loading: true`, it reduces initial token consumption by 85% (from ~77K to ~8.7K tokens for 50+ tools) and improves accuracy by ensuring Claude only sees relevant tools. This is particularly beneficial for large MCP-powered systems with many tools.

**Programmatic Tool Calling** enables Claude to orchestrate multi-step workflows through generated Python code within a sandboxed execution environment. This prevents intermediate results (like large datasets or numerous line items) from polluting Claude's context window, as only the final, processed output is returned. This leads to substantial token savings (a 37% reduction on complex tasks), reduced latency by minimizing model inference passes, and improved accuracy through explicit control flow. It's ideal for processing large datasets, performing parallel operations, or complex multi-step tasks requiring data transformation.

**Tool Use Examples** provide a universal standard for demonstrating effective tool usage patterns. This helps Claude learn beyond the structural definitions of JSON schemas, understanding when to use optional parameters or specific API conventions.

Together, these features allow Claude to interact with unlimited tool libraries more efficiently, accurately, and scalably, opening new possibilities for building advanced AI agents.
chinese_title: 克劳德进阶工具使用
chinese_summary:
Anthropic为Claude发布了三项新功能，旨在增强AI代理能力，解决与庞大工具库、复杂编排以及学习正确工具使用方法相关的挑战。

**工具搜索工具**解决了大量工具定义占用大量上下文窗口空间的问题（例如，58个工具占用55K token）。通过允许工具使用 `defer_loading: true` 按需发现和加载，它将初始token消耗降低了85%（对于50多个工具，从约77K降至约8.7K token），并通过确保Claude只看到相关工具来提高准确性。这对于拥有大量工具的大型MCP驱动系统尤其有利。

**程序化工具调用**使Claude能够通过沙盒执行环境中生成的Python代码来编排多步骤工作流。这可以防止中间结果（如大型数据集或大量明细项）污染Claude的上下文窗口，因为只有最终处理后的输出才会被返回。这带来了大幅的token节省（复杂任务中减少37%），通过最大限度地减少模型推理次数来降低延迟，并通过显式控制流提高准确性。它非常适用于处理大型数据集、执行并行操作或需要数据转换的复杂多步骤任务。

**工具使用示例**提供了一个通用标准，用于展示有效的工具使用模式。这有助于Claude超越JSON schema的结构定义进行学习，理解何时使用可选参数或特定API约定。

总而言之，这些功能使Claude能够更高效、更准确、更具扩展性地与无限工具库交互，为构建高级AI代理开辟了新的可能性。

title: Trillions spent and big software projects are still failing
summary:
Despite trillions spent globally on IT and two decades of technological advancement, major software projects continue to fail at a persistent and alarming rate. Global IT spending has more than tripled since 2005, yet success rates haven't improved, leading to escalating business and societal costs as software permeates every aspect of life.

The article argues that AI tools and coding copilots won't solve these systemic management problems, which arise from the complex interplay of systems engineering, financial management, organizational politics, and often irrational decision-making. Root causes of failure include human imagination failures, unrealistic goals, inability to handle complexity, and unmanaged risks—factors extensively documented but repeatedly ignored.

Catastrophic examples include Canada’s CA $310 million Phoenix payroll system, which caused widespread pay errors, financial hardship, and suicides, ultimately costing over CA $5.1 billion. Even worse, the UK Post Office’s Horizon system led to the wrongful conviction and incarceration of hundreds of postmasters due to deliberately hidden software errors, becoming the worst operational IT failure to date, yet it remains in use.

The financial toll is immense; in the US alone, operational and development software failures cost over $2 trillion annually. While modern approaches like Agile and DevOps exist, they frequently fall short due to a lack of consistent leadership, organizational discipline, and cultural change. The IT community stubbornly refuses to learn from past errors, often dismissing prior lessons as irrelevant, making repeated failures incredibly expensive and posing an existential threat to modern society.
chinese_title: 耗资万亿，大型软件项目依然失败
chinese_summary:
尽管全球在IT领域投入了数万亿美元，技术也取得了二十年的进步，但大型软件项目仍以持续且惊人的速度失败。自2005年以来，全球IT支出已增长逾三倍，但成功率并未提高，随着软件渗透到生活的方方面面，这导致商业和社会成本不断攀升。

文章认为，人工智能工具和编程助手无法解决这些系统性管理问题，这些问题源于系统工程、财务管理、组织政治以及往往非理性的决策之间复杂的相互作用。失败的根本原因包括人类想象力的不足、不切实际的目标、处理复杂性的能力不足以及未能有效管理的风险——这些因素已被广泛记录，但却一再被忽视。

灾难性的例子包括加拿大耗资3.1亿加元的“凤凰”薪资系统，该系统导致了普遍的工资错误、经济困难乃至自杀事件，最终耗费超过51亿加元。更糟糕的是，英国邮局的“地平线”系统由于蓄意隐藏的软件错误，导致数百名邮政局长被错误定罪和监禁，成为迄今为止最严重的运营IT故障，但它仍在继续使用。

经济损失巨大；仅在美国，运营和开发软件故障每年就造成超过2万亿美元的损失。尽管存在敏捷和DevOps等现代方法，但由于缺乏持续的领导力、组织纪律和文化变革，它们常常无法达到预期效果。IT界固执地拒绝从过去的错误中吸取教训，经常将过去的经验教训视为不相关，这使得重复的失败代价极其高昂，并对现代社会构成生存威胁。

title: PS5 now costs less than 64GB of DDR5 memory. RAM jumps to $600 due to shortage
summary:
DDR5 RAM prices have skyrocketed due to the AI boom's immense demand for memory and storage, making it increasingly unaffordable for end-consumers. A 64GB G.Skill Trident Z5 Neo 6000 MT/s RAM kit is now listed at $599.99, significantly more expensive than a PS5 Slim ($449) or Xbox Series S ($399), and only $50 less than a PS5 Pro ($649).

This represents an astounding ~190% surge in just two months; the same kit previously cost $205-$220, and comparable kits were as low as $140 earlier this year. Manufacturers are prioritizing AI clients, leading to widespread shortages. This "AI crunch" is also depleting hard drive stocks, backordering large-capacity HDDs for two years, and driving up demand for QLC SSDs. Even Valve's upcoming Steam Machine faces higher costs due to the DRAM crisis.

Experts predict DRAM and NAND constraints will persist through 2026. However, the memory market historically cycles through oversupply and undersupply, suggesting that DDR5 prices might return to bargain levels around 2027.
chinese_title: PS5售价已低于64GB DDR5内存；内存因短缺飙升至600美元
chinese_summary:
由于人工智能热潮对内存和存储的巨大需求，DDR5内存价格一路飙升，使其对终端消费者来说越来越难以承受。一套64GB芝奇幻锋戟Z5 Neo 6000 MT/s内存套件现在标价599.99美元，明显高于一台PS5 Slim（449美元）或Xbox Series S（399美元），并且只比一台PS5 Pro（649美元）便宜50美元。

这代表着在短短两个月内惊人的约190%涨幅；同样的套件此前售价205-220美元，而今年早些时候，同类套件价格曾低至140美元。制造商正在优先满足AI客户的需求，导致普遍的短缺。这场“AI危机”也在耗尽硬盘库存，导致大容量硬盘的积压订单长达两年，并推高了对QLC固态硬盘的需求。甚至Valve即将推出的Steam掌机也由于DRAM危机而面临更高的成本。

专家预测DRAM和NAND的供应紧张将持续到2026年。然而，内存市场历来在供过于求和供不应求之间循环，这表明DDR5价格可能在2027年左右回落到廉价水平。

title: Voyager 1 Is About to Reach One Light-Day from Earth
summary:
NASA's Voyager 1 spacecraft is set to achieve a historic milestone by November 15, 2026: it will reach a distance of 16.1 billion miles (25.9 billion km) from Earth. At this point, a radio signal will take a full 24 hours—one light-day—to reach the probe.

Launched in 1977 to explore Jupiter and Saturn, Voyager 1 entered interstellar space in 2012, becoming the most distant human-made object. Traveling at 11 miles per second (17.7 km/s), it adds about 3.5 astronomical units annually, continuing to transmit data thanks to its radioisotope thermoelectric generators, expected to last into the 2030s.

Communicating with Voyager 1 is a slow process; commands take a day to arrive, and another for confirmation, contrasting sharply with communication times to closer celestial bodies. This vast distance underscores the immense scale of space, making a light-day seem tiny in cosmic terms (e.g., light takes over four years to reach Proxima Centauri). Beyond its distance record, Voyager 1's mission, including its famous "Pale Blue Dot" image, symbolizes human ingenuity, the vastness of our solar system, and the enduring spirit of exploration.
chinese_title: 旅行者1号即将达到距地球一光日
chinese_summary:
美国宇航局的“旅行者1号”探测器将于2026年11月15日达到一个历史性的里程碑：它将抵达距离地球161亿英里（259亿公里）的位置。届时，一个无线电信号将需要整整24小时——即一个“光日”——才能抵达该探测器。

“旅行者1号”于1977年发射，旨在探索木星和土星，并于2012年进入星际空间，成为距离地球最远的人造物体。它以每秒11英里（17.7公里/秒）的速度飞行，每年增加约3.5个天文单位，并凭借其放射性同位素热电发生器持续传输数据，这些发生器预计将持续工作到2030年代。

与“旅行者1号”通信是一个缓慢的过程；指令需要一天才能抵达，再用一天才能确认，这与距离较近天体的通信时间形成鲜明对比。这遥远的距离凸显了太空的浩瀚规模，使得一个“光日”在宇宙尺度上显得微不足道（例如，光需要四年多才能抵达比邻星）。除了其距离记录之外，“旅行者1号”的任务，包括其著名的“暗淡蓝点”图像，象征着人类的智慧、我们太阳系的浩瀚以及永恒的探索精神。

title: I don't care how well your "AI" works
summary:
The author expresses deep disillusionment over the casual adoption of "AI" (specifically LLMs) even among progressive hacker circles, viewing it as a "brainworm" or "harmful coping mechanism." They observe talented programmers facing an existential crisis as their craft is rapidly devalued, similar to what designers, writers, and other artisans have experienced.

While personally avoiding LLMs, the author acknowledges this is a privilege, as many are compelled to use these systems due to societal pressures, employer expectations, and increasing "knowledge pollution." The article argues that focusing solely on AI's technical flaws or biases misses the fundamental, intentional problems designed to centralize power.

The author emphasizes that tools shape our thoughts and identity. AI systems subtly influence cognitive processes, making users believe the output truly reflects their original thoughts, thereby undermining genuine creative and reflective processes. Ultimately, AI systems are depicted as instruments of control, reinforcing existing capitalist and fascist power structures by converting capital into control and intentionally destroying craft and expression.

The piece concludes with a call to action for "survival under metastatic capitalism," urging readers to support friends, unionize, nurture their minds by reducing social media, educate themselves, and create original work. Thriving, the author states, is the most disobedient act.
chinese_title: 我才不在乎你的‘AI’运行得怎么样呢。
chinese_summary:

尽管作者个人避免使用大型语言模型，但承认这是一种特权，因为许多人受制于社会压力、雇主期望以及日益增长的“知识污染”，不得不使用这些系统。文章指出，仅仅关注AI的技术缺陷或偏见，会忽视其旨在集中权力的根本性、蓄意设计的问题。

作者强调工具塑造我们的思想和身份。AI系统微妙地影响认知过程，让用户相信输出真正反映了他们的原始思想，从而破坏了真正的创造性和反思过程。最终，AI系统被描绘成控制的工具，通过将资本转化为控制并蓄意摧毁手艺和表达，强化了现有的资本主义和法西斯主义权力结构。

文章最后呼吁“在转移性资本主义下求生”，敦促读者支持朋友、加入工会、通过减少社交媒体滋养心智、自我教育并创造原创作品。作者指出，蓬勃发展是最不服从的行为。

title: Human brains are preconfigured with instructions for understanding the world
summary:
Researchers at UC Santa Cruz, led by Professor Tal Sharf, have uncovered new insights into early human brain development using brain organoids – 3D models of brain tissue grown from stem cells. Their study, published in Nature Neuroscience, reveals that the brain's earliest electrical activity occurs in structured patterns *before* any sensory experiences.

This groundbreaking finding suggests the human brain is preconfigured with inherent instructions or a "primordial operating system" for understanding and interacting with the world. The organoids spontaneously emit complex, time-based electrical patterns within months of development, strikingly similar to the brain's "default mode" – a basic firing structure that later refines for specific senses. This points to a genetically encoded blueprint guiding neural architecture, rather than patterns emerging solely in response to external stimuli.

This research has significant implications for understanding neurodevelopmental disorders, assessing the impact of environmental toxins like pesticides and microplastics on the developing brain, and ultimately, developing targeted therapies and interventions. Organoids provide an ethical and controlled platform to observe this fundamental self-assembly process, offering a unique window into how the brain builds itself.
chinese_title: 人脑预设了理解世界的指令。
chinese_summary:
加州大学圣克鲁斯分校Tal Sharf教授领导的研究团队利用大脑类器官——由干细胞培育出的三维脑组织模型——揭示了早期人类大脑发育的新见解。他们的研究发表在《自然-神经科学》杂志上，表明大脑最早的电活动在任何感官体验 *之前* 就以结构化的模式出现。

这一突破性发现表明，人类大脑预先配置了固有的指令或一个“原始操作系统”，用于理解和与世界互动。这些类器官在发育数月内自发地发出复杂的、基于时间的电活动模式，这与大脑的“默认模式”惊人地相似——这种基本放电结构随后会为特定的感官进行完善。这表明，神经结构是由基因编码的蓝图指导的，而非模式仅仅是响应外部刺激而产生。

这项研究对于理解神经发育障碍、评估农药和微塑料等环境毒素对发育中大脑的影响，并最终开发有针对性的疗法和干预措施具有重要意义。类器官提供了一个合乎伦理且受控的平台来观察这种基本的自组装过程，为我们了解大脑如何构建自身提供了独特的窗口。

title: Orion 1.0
summary:
Orion for macOS 1.0 officially launched on November 25, 2025, after six years of development, joining its iOS and iPadOS versions. Developed by Kagi, Orion is a privacy-first, user-centric browser designed to counter modern browsing's drift towards ad-funded models and data exploitation. It expands Kagi’s "Kagiverse" of privacy-respecting products.

A core differentiating factor is Orion's use of WebKit, Safari's open-source engine, rather than Chromium. This provides deep optimization for macOS/iOS, avoids Chromium monoculture, and detaches it from advertising-funded giants. Orion is built for speed, with a lean codebase and optimized performance, and privacy by default, featuring zero telemetry, no baked-in ad/tracking tech, and strong content blocking.

Regarding AI, Orion adopts a security-first approach: its core contains no built-in AI, allowing users to connect to their chosen AI tools, including Kagi’s, while maintaining a secure separation. The browser offers unique features like Focus Mode, Link Preview, Mini Toolbar, and "Profiles as Apps" for isolating browsing environments.

Orion is free for everyone, including 200 free Kagi searches, and is entirely self-funded by its users through optional Tip Jar, Supporter Subscriptions ($5/month or $50/year), or a Lifetime Access fee ($150). Supporters gain access to Orion+ perks like floating windows and advanced customization.

Currently available on macOS, iOS, and iPadOS, Orion is in alpha for Linux and under development for Windows (targeting late 2026), aiming for seamless cross-platform synchronization. The roadmap includes further customization, performance enhancements, and deeper, user-controlled Kagi AI integrations.

title: Ilya Sutskever: We're moving from the age of scaling to the age of research
summary:
Ilya Sutskever posits that AI is shifting from an "age of scaling" to an "age of research." He highlights a significant "jaggedness" in current AI models: despite excelling on evaluations, they struggle with real-world generalization, leading to a disconnect between their perceived intelligence and economic impact.

Sutskever suggests this limitation stems from reinforcement learning (RL) training inadvertently focusing on eval-specific tasks, akin to a student memorizing for a test rather than achieving deep understanding. He argues that humans generalize far better, even with vastly less "pre-training" data, noting that an AI might fix one bug only to reintroduce another.

He questions whether vast pre-training data inherently leads to the deep, human-like understanding required for robust generalization. Sutskever also emphasizes the crucial role of "value functions," analogous to human emotions, in effective decision-making. Citing cases where brain damage impairing emotional processing severely hinders decision-making, he implies that integrating such fundamental mechanisms is vital for creating viable AI agents—an area currently underexplored in machine learning. The "age of research" will focus on these foundational challenges beyond mere computational scale.
chinese_title: 伊利亚·萨茨克维尔：我们正在从规模化时代迈向研究时代
chinese_summary:
伊利亚·苏茨克维认为，人工智能正在从“规模化时代”转向“研究时代”。他强调当前AI模型存在显著的“参差不齐”：尽管在评估中表现出色，但它们在现实世界泛化方面却举步维艰，导致其感知智能与经济影响之间存在脱节。

苏茨克维指出，这一局限性源于强化学习（RL）训练无意中侧重于特定评估任务，类似于学生为考试死记硬背而非获得深刻理解。他认为，即使预训练数据量少得多，人类的泛化能力也远超AI，并提到AI可能修复一个错误却又重新引入另一个错误。

他质疑海量预训练数据本身是否能带来实现稳健泛化所需的深刻、类人的理解。苏茨克维还强调了“价值函数”（类似于人类情感）在有效决策中的关键作用。他引用了脑损伤损害情感处理能力从而严重阻碍决策的案例，暗示整合这些基本机制对于创建可行的AI智能体至关重要——而这在机器学习领域目前尚未充分探索。“研究时代”将聚焦于这些超越单纯计算规模的基础性挑战。

title: Show HN: We built an open source, zero webhooks payment processor
summary:
Flowglad is an open-source, zero-webhooks payment processor designed to simplify internet money handling and modernize the developer experience in billing. It eliminates the need for managing webhooks, separate subscription tables, or Flowglad-specific customer IDs. Instead, it acts as a single source of truth for a customer's billing state, including feature access and usage meter credits, which can be queried directly using your application's existing user or organization IDs.

The platform provides a full-stack SDK, featuring a `useBilling()` React hook for frontend integration and a `flowgladServer.getBilling()` method for backend access. This allows real-time feature gating, usage balance checks, and checkout session creation. Flowglad is adaptable, enabling developers to iterate on pricing models in testmode and push them to production instantly, supporting seamless model rotation without redeployment.

Integration is straightforward, typically taking under a minute: install the relevant Flowglad package (e.g., `@flowglad/nextjs`), configure a server client with your `customerExternalId` and `getCustomerDetails` function, expose an API route for secure communication, and wrap your application with the `FlowgladProvider`.

Flowglad supports infinite pricing models, offering customizable templates for various strategies like usage-limit hybrids, tiered access, and feature-gated subscriptions. Its overarching goal is to transform the stagnant payments landscape by offering a self-serve, low-maintenance billing layer that improves developer experience, reduces integration time, and is prepared for the increasing complexity of modern, AI-driven applications.

title: FLUX.2: Frontier Visual Intelligence
summary:
Black Forest Labs has launched FLUX.2: Frontier Visual Intelligence, a powerful advancement in image generation and editing. Adhering to an "Open Core" philosophy, FLUX.2 combines state-of-the-art capabilities with open-weight models and production-ready APIs, fostering innovation among researchers and creatives.

FLUX.2 significantly enhances production workflows by generating high-quality, photoreal images and complex infographics with legible typography, all at resolutions up to 4 megapixels. Key improvements include superior character and style consistency across up to 10 reference images, refined image detail, sharper textures, and stable lighting ideal for product shots. The model demonstrates improved adherence to complex prompts, better world knowledge, and coherent spatial logic. It also supports image editing at 4MP while preserving detail.

The FLUX.2 family offers several versions:
*   **FLUX.2 [pro]:** Delivers state-of-the-art image quality, speed, and cost-effectiveness.
*   **FLUX.2 [flex]:** Provides developers control over parameters like steps and guidance scale, excelling in text and fine details.
*   **FLUX.2 [dev]:** A 32B open-weight model, currently the most powerful open-source option for image generation and editing.
*   **FLUX.2 [klein]:** (coming soon) An Apache 2.0 open-source, size-distilled model.
*   **FLUX.2 - VAE:** A new open-source variational autoencoder that forms the foundation of FLUX.2.

Built on a latent flow matching architecture, FLUX.2 integrates a Mistral-3 24B vision-language model with a rectified flow transformer, and features a re-trained latent space for improved learnability and image quality. Black Forest Labs envisions FLUX.2 as an indispensable component of creative infrastructure, driving towards open, multimodal visual intelligence.

title: AI has a deep understanding of how this code works
summary:
This GitHub Pull Request (#14369) introduces DWARF v5 debugging support for the OCaml native compiler, allowing robust source-level debugging in GDB and LLDB. Developed by joelreymont, it targets AMD64 and ARM64 architectures on Linux/ELF and macOS/Mach-O, explicitly disabling support for 32-bit platforms and Windows/other.

The implementation focuses on core DWARF v5 features like inline strings (DW_FORM_string) to prevent linker issues, multi-compilation unit support, and section-relative relocations for portability. Debugging capabilities include function and line breakpoints, tracking of parameters and local let-bound variables with their original source names, correct lexical block mapping, and basic OCaml type information.

An LLDB plug-in (`ocaml_lldb.py`) is provided for OCaml-specific value formatting, accessed via `ocaml print`. Debug information is enabled using `ocamlopt -g`, with no runtime overhead when disabled.

The 40-commit PR transitioned from DWARF v4 to v5, addressed architecture-specific register mappings, and implemented `Variable_info` and `Var_lifetime` modules to preserve variable names and lifetimes through the compilation pipeline. Extensive testing ensures DWARF structure, breakpoint functionality, type visibility, and multi-object linking work across platforms.

However, during review, a significant concern was raised by yallop regarding the code's origin, citing an external webpage crediting "Claude" and requesting joelreymont to clarify where the code was obtained.
chinese_title: 人工智能对这段代码的工作原理有深入理解。
chinese_summary:
这个GitHub拉取请求（#14369）为OCaml原生编译器引入了DWARF v5调试支持，从而在GDB和LLDB中实现了强大的源代码级调试。该功能由joelreymont开发，目标是Linux/ELF和macOS/Mach-O平台上的AMD64和ARM64架构，并明确禁用了对32位平台和Windows/其他系统的支持。

该实现侧重于DWARF v5的核心特性，例如内联字符串（DW_FORM_string）以防止链接器问题、多编译单元支持以及节相关重定位，以提高可移植性。调试功能包括函数和行断点、跟踪参数和局部let绑定变量及其原始源代码名称、正确的词法块映射以及基本的OCaml类型信息。

提供了一个LLDB插件（`ocaml_lldb.py`），用于OCaml特有的值格式化，可通过`ocaml print`访问。调试信息通过`ocamlopt -g`启用，禁用时没有运行时开销。

这个包含40次提交的PR从DWARF v4过渡到v5，解决了特定于架构的寄存器映射问题，并实现了`Variable_info`和`Var_lifetime`模块，以在编译管道中保留变量名和生命周期。广泛的测试确保DWARF结构、断点功能、类型可见性以及多对象链接在不同平台上均能正常工作。

title: GrapheneOS migrates server infrastructure from France
summary:
GrapheneOS has announced it is migrating all server infrastructure out of France, deeming the country unsafe for "open source privacy projects." Previously hosted by French provider OVH Bearharnois, the project is moving its Mastodon, Discourse, and Matrix instances to Toronto, while critical website infrastructure will be hosted by German company Netcup. Core services like signature verification and downgrade protection are unaffected, as GrapheneOS states it does not collect confidential user data in France.

The decision was prompted by the French government's support for the European Union Chat Control proposal and negative press from Le Parisien. An interview with French cybercrime prosecutor Johanna Brousse implied potential legal action against GrapheneOS if links to criminal organizations are found and they fail to cooperate.

GrapheneOS argues that Le Parisien conflated their legitimate project with "government-sponsored forks"—fake copies featuring elements like a bogus Snapchat app and dark web advertising, which are not part of the official GrapheneOS. The project has previously threatened litigation against such forks, citing ANOM, an FBI-backed compromised Android OS, as an example. Due to these concerns, GrapheneOS developers are now refusing to travel to or work within France.

title: Python is not a great language for data science
summary:
In "Python is not a great language for data science," Claus Wilke argues that Python, while popular, is not inherently superior for general data science tasks (excluding deep learning) and often leads to cumbersome experiences compared to R. He shares his observations from a research lab where Python-using students, and even an expert colleague, consistently find interactive data exploration, quick analyses, or plot modifications more difficult and time-consuming than he anticipates, a stark contrast to R's perceived agility.

Wilke defines an effective data science language as interactive, with low startup costs, and prioritizing programmer convenience over raw performance. A critical feature is its ability to separate the analytical logic from the logistical details of implementation (e.g., avoiding manual loops, indices, or data restructuring). He demonstrates this by comparing R's tidyverse and Python's pandas for a data aggregation task, noting both succeed at a high level, but highlighting how basic Python quickly devolves into logistical complexity.

He concludes that Python's language features or existing libraries frequently force users into dealing with data logistics, hindering high-level conceptual programming. Wilke plans to detail these specific issues in subsequent articles.
chinese_title: Python 并非一门优秀的数据科学语言。
chinese_summary:

Wilke将一种有效的数据科学语言定义为：交互式的，启动成本低，并且优先考虑程序员的便利性而非原始性能。一个关键特性是它能够将分析逻辑与实现中的后勤细节（例如，避免手动循环、索引或数据重构）分离开来。他通过比较R的tidyverse和Python的pandas在数据聚合任务中的表现来论证这一点，指出两者都能在高级层面成功完成任务，但强调了基础Python如何迅速演变为后勤复杂性。

他总结说，Python的语言特性或现有库常常迫使用户处理数据后勤问题，从而阻碍了高层次的概念性编程。Wilke计划在后续文章中详细阐述这些具体问题。

title: Brain has five 'eras' with adult mode not starting until early 30s
summary:
Scientists have identified five distinct "epochs" of human brain development, marked by four pivotal "turning points" at approximately ages 9, 32, 66, and 83. This comprehensive study, based on nearly 4,000 brain scans from infancy to 90 years old, mapped how neural connections evolve.

The first era, **childhood (birth to 9)**, is characterized by "network consolidation," where synapses are refined, wiring efficiency decreases, and grey/white matter grow, with cortical thickness peaking.

The **adolescent phase (9 to 32)** sees continued white matter growth, refined communication networks, and increasing connection efficiency, linked to enhanced cognitive performance. Researchers clarify this refers to the *pattern of change*, not implying individuals in their late 20s act like teenagers. This period is particularly relevant for understanding mental health disorder risk factors, which often emerge during adolescence.

The brain enters **adult mode at around 32**, the longest era, lasting until 66. During this time, brain architecture stabilizes, corresponding with a plateau in intelligence and personality, and increased compartmentalization. Life events like parenthood may influence changes around this turning point.

The final two phases are **early ageing (66 to 83)** and **late ageing (from 83 onwards)**, both defined by decreases in brain connectivity, believed to be related to ageing and white matter degeneration.

Understanding these distinct brain eras and their turning points offers insights into when and how brain wiring is vulnerable to disruption and helps explain the emergence of mental health disorders often seen in adolescence.
chinese_title: 大脑有五个“时代”，成人模式直到30出头才开启
chinese_summary:
科学家们已经确定了人类大脑发展的五个不同“时期”，其标志是大约在9岁、32岁、66岁和83岁时的四个关键“转折点”。这项基于近4000份从婴儿期到90岁脑部扫描数据的全面研究，描绘了神经连接的演变过程。

第一个时期，**童年期（出生至9岁）**，其特征是“网络整合”，在此期间突触得到优化，连接效率下降，灰白质增长，大脑皮层厚度达到峰值。

**青少年期（9岁至32岁）**，白质持续增长，通讯网络得到完善，连接效率不断提高，这与认知能力增强相关。研究人员澄清，这指的是*变化模式*，并非暗示二十多岁的人行为举止像青少年。这一时期对于理解精神健康障碍的风险因素尤为重要，这些风险因素通常在青少年期出现。

大脑在**32岁左右进入成人模式**，这是最长的时期，持续到66岁。在此期间，大脑结构趋于稳定，与智力和个性的稳定期相对应，并且分隔化程度增加。诸如为人父母等人生事件可能会影响这个转折点附近的变化。

最后两个阶段是**早期衰老（66岁至83岁）**和**晚期衰老（83岁以后）**，两者都以大脑连接性下降为特征，据信这与衰老和白质退化有关。

了解这些独特的大脑时期及其转折点，有助于深入了解大脑连接何时以及如何容易受到干扰，并有助于解释青少年期常见的精神健康障碍的出现。

title: Most Stable Raspberry Pi? Better NTP with Thermal Management
summary:
The article details an advanced method to improve the stability of a Raspberry Pi-based NTP server, addressing frequency drift caused by CPU temperature fluctuations. Despite using a stable GPS PPS reference, the author observed system clock frequency variations that correlated with CPU temperature changes throughout the day. The key insight is that the underlying crystal oscillator, which is temperature-dependent and located near the CPU, is directly affected by these thermal shifts.

The solution, dubbed "Austin's Nerdy Things," consists of two main parts, resulting in an 81% reduction in frequency variability and a 77% reduction in frequency standard deviation:

1.  **CPU Core Pinning and Real-Time Priority:** CPU 0 is dedicated to critical timing tasks (`chronyd` and PPS interrupts). A boot script ensures all CPUs run at maximum frequency (performance governor), pins the PPS interrupt and `chronyd` to CPU 0, and sets `chronyd` to real-time priority. This isolates and prioritizes time-sensitive operations.

2.  **PID-Controlled Thermal Stabilization:** A Python-based "time burner" script utilizes a PID controller to maintain a constant CPU temperature (e.g., 54°C). This is achieved by running worker processes on CPUs 1-3 (avoiding CPU 0), which busy-loop (MD5 hashing) or sleep based on the PID output. By actively controlling the CPU's temperature, the thermal environment for the crystal oscillator is stabilized, keeping its frequency consistent.

This combination dramatically reduced the mean RMS offset by 49% (from 85.44 ns to 43.54 ns), demonstrating significantly better time accuracy despite ambient temperature swings. The article provides step-by-step instructions for implementing these optimizations using shell scripts and systemd services.
chinese_title: 最稳定的树莓派？散热管理助NTP更准。
chinese_summary:
文章详细介绍了一种先进方法，旨在提高基于树莓派的NTP服务器的稳定性，解决由CPU温度波动引起的频率漂移问题。尽管使用了稳定的GPS PPS参考，作者仍观察到系统时钟频率变化与全天CPU温度变化相关。关键在于，靠近CPU且受温度影响的底层晶体振荡器直接受到这些热变化的影响。

该解决方案被命名为“Austin's Nerdy Things”，包含两个主要部分，使频率可变性降低了81%，频率标准差降低了77%：

1.  **CPU核心绑定和实时优先级：** CPU 0专门用于关键计时任务（`chronyd`和PPS中断）。一个启动脚本确保所有CPU以最大频率运行（性能调控器），将PPS中断和`chronyd`绑定到CPU 0，并将`chronyd`设置为实时优先级。这隔离并优先处理了时间敏感的操作。

2.  **PID控制的热稳定性：** 一个基于Python的“时间燃烧器”脚本利用PID控制器来维持恒定的CPU温度（例如54°C）。这是通过在CPU 1-3上（避开CPU 0）运行工作进程实现的，这些工作进程根据PID输出进行忙循环（MD5哈希计算）或休眠。通过主动控制CPU温度，晶体振荡器的热环境得以稳定，从而保持其频率一致。

这种组合将均方根偏移均值显著降低了49%（从85.44纳秒降至43.54纳秒），表明尽管环境温度波动，时间精度仍显著提高。文章提供了使用shell脚本和systemd服务实现这些优化的分步说明。

title: New layouts with CSS Subgrid
summary:
CSS Subgrid is a powerful extension to CSS Grid that allows grid layouts to propagate deeper into the DOM tree, addressing limitations where only direct children could participate in a grid. Initially perceived as a convenience for semantic markup, it proves to unlock new layout possibilities.

The article first illustrates subgrid's basic mechanics by demonstrating how it solves the problem of semantically grouping images in an `<ul>` tag, which would otherwise break a flat grid layout. By applying `display: grid`, `grid-row: span 2`, `grid-column: span 3`, and crucially `grid-template-rows: subgrid; grid-template-columns: subgrid;` to the `<ul>`, its `<li>` children can align with the parent grid. While simple cases might be solvable with nested Flexbox/Grid, subgrid shines in more complex scenarios.

A more compelling use case is presented with a grid of article cards, each containing an image and text. Without subgrid, each `<article>` defines its own internal two-column grid (e.g., `2fr 1fr`). This leads to inconsistent column widths across sibling cards because each card's `fr` unit calculation is based solely on its own content, resulting in misaligned images and text columns across the overall grid. Forcing fixed percentages for columns can cause content overflow.

Subgrid offers an elegant solution: the parent `.grid` defines the entire track structure (e.g., `grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 2fr 1fr)` for a two-column layout, where each "column" block is `2fr 1fr`). Then, each child `<article>` is instructed to span these two tracks (`grid-column: span 2`) and use `display: grid; grid-template-columns: subgrid;` to inherit the parent's defined column structure. This ensures that all images and text content across all cards align perfectly, as they are all referencing the *same* underlying grid track definitions. Subgrid thus enables complex, coordinated layouts that were previously challenging to achieve with CSS.
chinese_title: 使用 CSS 子网格的新布局
chinese_summary:
CSS 子网格是 CSS Grid 的强大扩展，它允许网格布局更深入地渗透到 DOM 树中，解决了只有直接子元素才能参与网格的局限性。它最初被认为是语义化标记的便利工具，但事实证明能开启新的布局可能性。

文章首先通过演示子网格如何解决在 `<ul>` 标签中语义化分组图片的问题来阐释其基本机制，否则这种分组会破坏扁平的网格布局。通过对 `<ul>` 应用 `display: grid`、`grid-row: span 2`、`grid-column: span 3`，以及关键的 `grid-template-rows: subgrid; grid-template-columns: subgrid;`，其 `<li>` 子元素便能与父网格对齐。虽然简单情况可能通过嵌套的 Flexbox/Grid 解决，但子网格在更复杂的场景中大放异彩。

文章提出了一个更引人注目的用例：一个由文章卡片组成的网格，每张卡片包含图片和文本。没有子网格时，每个 `<article>` 都定义自己的内部两列网格（例如 `2fr 1fr`）。这导致兄弟卡片之间列宽不一致，因为每张卡片的 `fr` 单位计算仅基于其自身内容，从而使得整体网格中图片和文本列错位。强制使用固定百分比的列可能导致内容溢出。

子网格提供了一个优雅的解决方案：父级 `.grid` 定义了整个轨道结构（例如，对于两列布局，`grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 2fr 1fr)`，其中每个“列”块都是 `2fr 1fr`）。然后，每个子级 `<article>` 被指示跨越这两个轨道（`grid-column: span 2`），并使用 `display: grid; grid-template-columns: subgrid;` 来继承父级定义的列结构。这确保了所有卡片中的所有图片和文本内容完美对齐，因为它们都引用了 *相同* 的底层网格轨道定义。子网格从而实现了以前用 CSS 难以实现的复杂、协调的布局。

title: Unison 1.0
summary:
Unison 1.0 marks a stable release for its unique content-addressable programming language, distributed runtime, and developer workflow. Unison's core innovation identifies definitions by their actual contents, storing code in a database instead of text files. This design inherently solves many versioning conflicts, optimizes compilation, and enables building sophisticated, self-deploying distributed systems within a single strongly-typed program.

Key features of Unison 1.0 include:
*   **Collaborative tooling:** Streamlined workflows and a growing ecosystem, supported by Unison Share, an open-source community hub for code browsing and contributions.
*   **Unison Cloud:** A platform for deploying Unison applications, defining apps and infrastructure entirely in code. It also supports "Bring Your Own Cloud" (BYOC) for deployment on custom container infrastructure.
*   **Refined Developer Experience (DX):** Improvements in tooling, including the Unison Codebase Manager (ucm) CLI and the UCM Desktop GUI.
*   **Runtime optimizations:** Significant enhancements to the interpreter's speed and efficiency.
*   **Distributed systems frameworks:** Building blocks for scalable, fault-tolerant applications, such as the Volturno stream processing library.

The journey to 1.0 involved major milestones, including the company founding (2018), first alpha release (2019), adoption of SQLite (2021), launch of Unison Share, LSP support (2022), Unison Cloud's general availability (2024), open-sourcing Share (2024), and BYOC capabilities (2025). The project demonstrates strong momentum with over 26,000 commits and 150,000+ published definitions.

Future plans include C FFI support, improved record types, Cloud observability, and an agentic computing framework. Unison offers a native version control system and aims to provide a distinct, highly integrated development experience.
chinese_title: 统一 1.0
chinese_summary:
Unison 1.0 标志着其独特的“内容寻址”编程语言、分布式运行时和开发者工作流的稳定版发布。Unison 的核心创新在于通过定义内容的实际信息来识别定义，并将代码存储在数据库中而非文本文件。这种设计从根本上解决了许多版本冲突，优化了编译，并使得在一个单一的强类型程序中构建复杂的、自部署的分布式系统成为可能。

Unison 1.0 的主要特性包括：
*   **协作工具：** 精简的工作流和不断发展的生态系统，由 Unison Share（一个用于代码浏览和贡献的开源社区中心）提供支持。
*   **Unison 云：** 一个用于部署 Unison 应用程序的平台，完全通过代码定义应用程序和基础设施。它还支持“自带云”（BYOC），用于在自定义容器基础设施上部署。
*   **优化开发者体验（DX）：** 工具方面的改进，包括 Unison Codebase Manager (ucm) 命令行界面和 UCM 桌面图形用户界面。
*   **运行时优化：** 解释器速度和效率的显著提升。
*   **分布式系统框架：** 可伸缩、容错应用程序的构建模块，例如 Volturno 流处理库。

迈向 1.0 的历程包含了重要里程碑，包括公司成立（2018年）、首次 Alpha 版本发布（2019年）、采用 SQLite（2021年）、Unison Share 推出、LSP 支持（2022年）、Unison Cloud 全面上市（2024年）、Share 开源（2024年）以及 BYOC 功能（2025年）。该项目展现出强劲的发展势头，拥有超过 26,000 次提交和 150,000 多个已发布的定义。

未来计划包括 C FFI 支持、改进的记录类型、云可观测性以及一个智能代理计算框架。Unison 提供原生版本控制系统，旨在提供独特且高度集成的开发体验。

title: APT Rust requirement raises questions
summary:
Julian Andres Klode, a Debian APT maintainer, has declared that Debian's Advanced Package Tool (APT) will require Rust by May 2026. This decision, aimed at modernization, memory safety, and stronger unit testing, has raised significant questions within the project.

The new dependency will primarily impact unofficial Debian ports like Alpha, Motorola 680x0, PA-RISC, and SuperH, which currently lack a working Rust toolchain. These ports would either need to acquire Rust support or remain on an older APT version.

Critics, including John Paul Adrian Glaubitz, found Klode's communication style confrontational. Fellow APT contributor David Kalnischkies questioned the necessity of Rust for unit testing, suggesting alternative approaches and even removing some parsing code from APT entirely. Adrian Bunk and Fabian Grünbichler highlighted existing Debian infrastructure problems with statically linked packages like those written in Rust, leading to limited security support and difficulties in tracking dependencies and CVEs.

The move is seen by some as contradictory to Debian's core values of supporting a wide range of hardware, democratic governance, and reliance on volunteer contributions, as a single developer is dictating a change with widespread impact. While the article acknowledges the growing adoption of Rust in free software, it emphasizes the need for more volunteers to improve Rust support across Debian, rather than unilateral mandates that create unplanned work for others.
chinese_title: APT Rust要求引发疑问
chinese_summary:
Debian APT 维护者朱利安·安德烈斯·克洛德宣布，Debian 的高级软件包工具 (APT) 将不迟于 2026 年 5 月要求使用 Rust。这一旨在实现现代化、内存安全和更强单元测试的决定，在项目中引发了重大质疑。

这一新依赖将主要影响 Alpha、Motorola 680x0、PA-RISC 和 SuperH 等非官方 Debian 移植版本，这些版本目前缺乏可用的 Rust 工具链。这些移植版本将要么需要获得 Rust 支持，要么保留旧版 APT。

包括约翰·保罗·阿德里安·格劳比茨在内的批评者认为，克洛德的沟通方式具有对抗性。APT 的同事贡献者大卫·卡尔尼什基斯质疑 Rust 对于单元测试的必要性，他提出了替代方法，甚至建议从 APT 中完全移除部分解析代码。阿德里安·邦克和法比安·格伦比希勒强调了 Debian 现有基础设施对于静态链接软件包（例如用 Rust 编写的软件包）存在的问题，这导致了有限的安全支持，并难以追踪依赖项和 CVE。

一些人认为，由于一位开发者正在主导一项具有广泛影响的变革，此举与 Debian 支持广泛硬件、民主治理和依赖志愿者贡献等核心价值观相矛盾。尽管文章承认 Rust 在自由软件中日益普及，但它强调需要更多志愿者来改进 Rust 在 Debian 中的支持，而不是由单方面指令给他人制造计划外的工作。

title: Roblox is a problem but it's a symptom of something worse
summary:
The article critiques the dismissive attitude of tech CEOs towards child safety and user harm, using Roblox CEO David Baszucki's recent interview as a key example. Baszucki expressed frustration when questioned about Roblox's historical safety failures, despite the platform targeting users as young as five. Historically, Roblox lacked effective age verification and allowed easy circumvention of safety features, contributing to numerous child predation incidents and lawsuits. The author argues that Roblox, like many tech companies, prioritized growth over implementing crucial safety guardrails.

This pattern is not isolated, extending to OpenAI prioritizing engagement over safety, TikTok's "digital well-being" features encouraging more app use, and Meta allegedly stalling child predator prevention efforts for growth. Internal Meta documents revealed employees comparing their tactics to tobacco companies "hooking them young" and deliberately downplaying addiction research findings.

The author concludes that this "delay, deny, and deflect" strategy is effective due to short public attention spans and a decline in corporate accountability. While past public pressure led to some improvements, today's tech leaders seem less responsive, prioritizing future visions over current user well-being. Baszucki's interview highlights a pervasive problem: a widespread dismissive mindset among tech executives.

The article also briefly notes Trump's administration withdrawing an executive order to preempt state AI regulations due to bipartisan backlash, and X's new "About This Account" feature inadvertently revealing many influential right-wing political accounts are based in foreign countries, reigniting concerns about inauthentic online activity.
chinese_title: 罗布乐思是个问题，但它只是更糟糕问题的一个症状。
chinese_summary:
文章批判了科技公司CEO对儿童安全和用户伤害的轻蔑态度，以Roblox首席执行官David Baszucki最近的采访为例。尽管该平台的用户年龄低至五岁，Baszucki在被问及Roblox历史上的安全失误时表现出沮丧。历史上，Roblox缺乏有效的年龄验证，并且允许轻易规避安全功能，导致了多起儿童掠夺事件和诉讼。作者认为，Roblox和许多科技公司一样，将增长置于实施关键安全防护措施之上。

这种模式并非孤立，还包括OpenAI将用户参与度置于安全之上，TikTok的“数字健康”功能反而鼓励更多应用使用，以及Meta据称为了增长而拖延儿童掠夺者预防工作。Meta内部文件显示，员工将他们的策略比作烟草公司“从小培养成瘾用户”，并故意淡化成瘾研究结果。

作者总结道，这种“拖延、否认和转移”的策略之所以有效，是由于公众注意力持续时间短以及企业责任感的下降。尽管过去的公众压力曾带来一些改进，但如今的科技领袖似乎反应迟钝，将未来愿景置于当前用户福祉之上。Baszucki的采访突出一个普遍存在的问题：科技高管中普遍存在的轻蔑心态。

文章还简要指出，特朗普政府因两党强烈反对而撤回了一项旨在先发制人州级AI法规的行政命令；以及X平台新的“关于此账户”功能无意中揭示许多有影响力的右翼政治账户设在国外，重新引发了对虚假在线活动的担忧。

title: A new bridge links the math of infinity to computer science
summary:
Mathematician Anton Bernshteyn has uncovered a profound and surprising connection between descriptive set theory, which explores the infinite nature of sets, and modern computer science, focused on finite networks and algorithms. He demonstrated that problems concerning certain infinite sets can be reformulated as challenges for computer networks to communicate and solve tasks. This bridge is remarkable given the distinct languages and scales (infinite vs. finite) traditionally used by the two fields.

Descriptive set theorists classify infinite sets based on their "measurability" (e.g., length or area), arranging them in a hierarchy. They often avoid the "axiom of choice," as its use can lead to "unmeasurable" or "pathological" sets. For example, coloring a specific infinite graph measurably might require three colors, whereas a two-color solution would involve unmeasurable sets when the axiom of choice is used.

Meanwhile, computer scientists study "distributed algorithms," where multiple computers in a network collaboratively solve problems, such as assigning communication channels (a coloring problem) to avoid interference. These "local algorithms" rely on nodes communicating only with immediate neighbors, aiming for efficiency.

Bernshteyn observed that the "thresholds" for coloring problems—the number of colors needed for certain properties—were strikingly similar in both domains. He proposes that efficient local algorithms in computer science directly correspond to Lebesgue-measurable colorings of infinite graphs in descriptive set theory. This groundbreaking insight implies that the fundamental structures of problems in these seemingly disparate fields are identical, simply expressed in different mathematical languages, paving the way for new discoveries and collaborations.
chinese_title: 新桥连接无穷数学与计算机科学
chinese_summary:
数学家安东·伯恩施泰因在探索集合无限性质的描述集理论与专注于有限网络和算法的现代计算机科学之间，发现了一个深刻而令人惊讶的联系。他证明了某些无限集相关的问题可以被重新表述为计算机网络进行通信和解决任务的挑战。鉴于这两个领域传统上使用的语言和尺度（无限与有限）截然不同，这座桥梁显得尤为卓越。

描述集理论家根据无限集的“可测性”（例如长度或面积）对其进行分类，并将其排列成一个层次结构。他们通常避免使用“选择公理”，因为它的使用可能导致“不可测”或“病态”的集合。例如，可测地为某个特定的无限图着色可能需要三种颜色，而使用选择公理时，两色解将涉及不可测集合。

与此同时，计算机科学家研究“分布式算法”，即网络中的多台计算机协同解决问题，例如分配通信信道（一个着色问题）以避免干扰。这些“局部算法”依赖于节点只与其直接邻居通信，旨在提高效率。

伯恩施泰因观察到，着色问题的“阈值”（即某些属性所需的颜色数量）在这两个领域中惊人地相似。他提出，计算机科学中的高效局部算法直接对应于描述集理论中无限图的勒贝格可测着色。这一开创性的见解意味着，这些看似截然不同的领域中的问题其基本结构是相同的，只是以不同的数学语言表达，为新的发现和合作铺平了道路。

title: TSMC Arizona outage saw fab halt, Apple wafers scrapped
summary:
An exclusive report reveals a power outage at an industrial gas facility, Linde, caused a significant manufacturing interruption at TSMC’s Fab 21 in Arizona in mid-September. A power fault at Linde, TSMC's outsourced gas supplier, halted crucial inputs, forcing the fab to shut down for hours and leading to the scrapping of thousands of wafers intended for clients like Apple, Nvidia, and AMD.

This previously unreported incident offers an alternative explanation for TSMC Arizona's 99% drop in net income during Q3, which had been widely attributed solely to rising operating costs. TSMC confirmed its Arizona unit positively contributes to revenue but noted profit is influenced by multiple factors, including expected gross margin dilution from overseas fab ramp-ups over five years. The company declined to address the disruption directly.

Fab shutdowns are rare for TSMC, whose expensive equipment runs 24/7, making even brief idle periods costly. While client impact is expected to be negligible and financial losses potentially covered by insurance due to the fab's still-small capacity, the event underscores challenges Taiwanese manufacturers face when relying on non-Taiwanese firms for critical operations in overseas facilities. This incident is part of the broader "cross-cultural adaptation" in establishing the Arizona fab.
chinese_title: 台积电亚利桑那厂停电致晶圆厂停产，苹果晶圆报废。
chinese_summary:
一份独家报道揭示，九月中旬，工业气体设施林德（Linde）的一次停电导致台积电亚利桑那州21厂（Fab 21）遭遇严重生产中断。台积电外包气体供应商林德的一次电力故障中断了关键原料供应，迫使该晶圆厂停产数小时，并导致数千片原定用于苹果、英伟达和AMD等客户的晶圆报废。

这一此前未被报道的事件，为台积电亚利桑那州工厂第三季度净收入锐减99%提供了另一种解释，此前人们普遍将此唯一归因于运营成本上升。台积电证实其亚利桑那州部门对营收有积极贡献，但指出利润受到多种因素影响，包括未来五年海外晶圆厂投产导致的毛利率稀释预期。该公司拒绝直接回应此次中断事件。

晶圆厂停产对台积电来说是罕见的，其昂贵的设备24/7不间断运行，因此即使短暂的闲置也会造成巨大损失。尽管预计对客户的影响微乎其微，且鉴于该晶圆厂产能仍小，财务损失可能由保险公司承担，但此次事件突显了台湾制造商在海外设施的关键运营中依赖非台湾公司时所面临的挑战。此事件是亚利桑那州晶圆厂建设过程中更广泛的“跨文化适应”的一部分。

title: Reinventing how .NET builds and ships (again)
summary:
The .NET team is revamping its build and shipping process again, as the previous distributed repository model, while suitable for general open-source, proved inefficient and unsustainable for quickly delivering a cohesive product. The system struggled with high costs for multiple versions, slow critical fixes (e.g., 36+ hour build times), increasing infrastructure maintenance burdens, and difficulty prototyping cross-stack features.

This inefficiency stemmed from two core problems: "Product Construction Complexity" (too many steps, coordination points, and environmental variances across interdependent repositories) and "Product Construction Overhead" (significant time spent on non-artifact-producing activities like dependency flow, PR reviews, and build queueing). A security patch, for instance, demanded intricate, sequential coordination across numerous teams and repositories to achieve "coherency" before a simultaneous release. Internal analysis showed alarming overhead, with an 8.0 runtime build revealing 38.5% of its total time as non-productive overhead.

To address these issues, the "Unified Build project" is moving product construction into a "virtual monolithic" repository, consolidating builds into "vertical builds," and leveraging "Linux distro Source Build." This aims to drastically reduce complexity and overhead, improving predictability and speed while retaining external contribution capabilities.
chinese_title: 重塑 .NET 构建与发布的方式 (再次)
chinese_summary:
.NET 团队正在再次彻底改革其构建和发布流程，因为先前的分布式存储库模型虽然适用于一般的开源项目，但对于快速交付一个内聚的产品而言，被证明效率低下且不可持续。该系统面临的挑战包括多版本的高昂成本、关键修复的缓慢（例如，36 小时以上的构建时间）、日益增长的基础设施维护负担以及跨栈功能原型开发的困难。

这种低效源于两个核心问题：“产品构建复杂性”（相互依赖的存储库之间步骤过多、协调点繁杂以及环境差异大）和“产品构建开销”（大量时间花费在非产物生成活动上，例如依赖流转、PR 审查和构建排队）。例如，一个安全补丁需要跨越众多团队和存储库进行复杂、顺序的协调，以在同步发布前实现“一致性”。内部分析显示了惊人的开销，其中一个 8.0 运行时构建显示其总时间的 38.5% 是非生产性开销。

为解决这些问题，“统一构建项目”正在将产品构建转移到一个“虚拟单体”存储库中，将构建整合为“垂直构建”，并利用“Linux 发行版源构建”。这旨在大幅降低复杂性和开销，提高可预测性和速度，同时保留外部贡献能力。

title: DoGE "cut muscle, not fat"; 26K experts rehired after brutal cuts
summary:
The Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE), a controversial agency spearheaded by Elon Musk to drastically reduce government spending and bureaucracy, has been terminated eight months early. Initially hyped to save a trillion dollars, DOGE reportedly saved significantly less ($214 billion, possibly overstated) and faced numerous lawsuits over illegal firings.

According to Elaine Kamarck of the Brookings Institution, DOGE "cut muscle, not fat," demonstrating a lack of understanding of critical government functions. Her report documented 26,511 instances where the Trump administration abruptly fired federal employees only to rehire them. These rehires were often critical professionals like engineers and doctors, with many mandates by courts or a tacit admission that essential missions were endangered.

DOGE's chaotic approach caused a substantial "brain drain," with 154,000 federal employees seeking deferred resignation and 70,000 retiring in the first six months of Trump's term. Although the hiring freeze is lifted, rehiring remains slow and appears biased.

While DOGE as a centralized entity is gone, its functions have been absorbed by the Office of Personnel Management (OPM) and Office of Management and Budget (OMB), indicating that "decentralized" cutting efforts will continue. Kamarck warns of severe consequences, including nuclear mismanagement, inadequate disaster responses, FBI failures, and compromised public health and social services if lost talent isn't replaced. Agencies are now scrambling to assess and mitigate the damage, but the government's ability to recover swiftly remains uncertain.
chinese_title: DoGE“割肉割到骨头”；残酷裁员后，2.6万专家获返聘
chinese_summary:
由埃隆·马斯克牵头、旨在大幅削减政府开支和官僚机构的备受争议的机构——政府效率部（DOGE），已提前八个月终止。DOGE最初被吹捧可节省一万亿美元，但据报道实际节省的资金远少于此（2140亿美元，可能被夸大），并因非法解雇面临多起诉讼。

布鲁金斯学会的伊莱恩·卡马克表示，DOGE“削的是肌肉，而不是脂肪”，表明其对关键政府职能缺乏了解。她的报告记录了26,511起特朗普政府突然解雇联邦雇员后又重新雇佣的案例。这些被重新雇佣的人员往往是工程师和医生等关键专业人士，其中许多是法院强制要求或默许承认基本任务受到威胁。

DOGE的混乱做法导致了严重的“人才流失”，特朗普任期前六个月内有15.4万名联邦雇员寻求延迟辞职，7万名雇员退休。尽管招聘冻结已解除，但重新招聘进展缓慢且似乎存在偏见。

尽管DOGE作为一个集中实体已经消失，但其职能已被人事管理办公室（OPM）和管理与预算办公室（OMB）吸收，这表明“分散化”的削减工作将继续进行。卡马克警告说，如果流失的人才得不到补充，将导致严重后果，包括核管理不善、灾害响应不足、联邦调查局（FBI）失职以及公共卫生和社会服务受到损害。各机构现在正争相评估和减轻损失，但政府能否迅速恢复仍不确定。

title: Google's new 'Aluminium OS' project brings Android to PC
summary:
Google is developing a new operating system, codenamed 'Aluminium OS,' to merge ChromeOS and Android into a single, unified desktop platform for PCs. This initiative aims to expand Android's presence beyond mobile devices, better compete with Windows, macOS, and iPad, and optimize development resources.

Aluminium OS, confirmed as an Android-based system, will integrate Google's AI stack, including Gemini, at its core. Job listings reveal ambitious plans for the OS to support various form factors like laptops, detachables, tablets, and mini-PCs, across multiple price tiers, including "AL Mass Premium" and "AL Premium," dispelling fears of it being limited to budget devices.

While Aluminium OS will initially coexist with ChromeOS, Google intends to eventually replace ChromeOS entirely. This transition will be carefully managed, offering legacy support for older ChromeOS devices and potential optional migration paths for capable existing Chromebooks. The final branding is still undecided, with possibilities including retaining the "ChromeOS" name or adopting "Android Desktop."

Google has confirmed the launch for 2026, with current development testing on Android 16. The initial public release is highly anticipated to be built upon Android 17. Google is collaborating with Qualcomm on this project to converge mobile and desktop computing.
chinese_title: 谷歌的新“Aluminium OS”项目将Android引入PC
chinese_summary:
谷歌正在开发一款代号为“Aluminium OS”的新操作系统，旨在将ChromeOS和Android融合为适用于PC的单一统一桌面平台。这一举措旨在将Android的影响力扩展到移动设备之外，更好地与Windows、macOS和iPad竞争，并优化开发资源。

Aluminium OS已被确认为一个基于Android的系统，其核心将集成谷歌的AI技术栈，包括Gemini。招聘信息揭示了该操作系统雄心勃勃的计划，即支持笔记本电脑、可拆卸设备、平板电脑和迷你PC等多种外形，涵盖“AL大众高端”和“AL高端”等多个价位，打消了它将仅限于低成本设备的担忧。

尽管Aluminium OS最初将与ChromeOS共存，但谷歌打算最终完全取代ChromeOS。这一过渡将得到精心管理，为旧款ChromeOS设备提供传统支持，并为现有具备能力的Chromebook提供潜在的可选迁移路径。最终品牌名称尚未确定，备选方案包括保留“ChromeOS”名称或采用“Android Desktop”。

谷歌已确认将于2026年推出，目前正在Android 16上进行开发测试。初次公开发布预计将基于Android 17。谷歌正在与高通合作开展此项目，旨在融合移动和桌面计算。

title: A cell so minimal that it challenges definitions of life
summary:
Scientists led by Takuro Nakayama have discovered a new single-celled archaeon, *Candidatus Sukunaarchaeum mirabile*, with an extraordinarily small genome of just 238,000 base pairs. This microbe is unique because it lacks nearly all metabolic genes, making it entirely dependent on a host cell for nutrient processing and growth. This extreme level of genetic reduction challenges fundamental biological definitions of life, which traditionally include metabolic self-sufficiency.

*Sukunaarchaeum* retains only the genetic components necessary for its own replication, representing a minimalist form of cellular life. Unlike other symbiotic microbes with reduced genomes that may contribute nutrients to their hosts, *Sukunaarchaeum* appears to be a self-absorbed parasite. While it is highly dependent on a host, it differs from viruses by possessing its own core machinery for gene expression, including ribosomes.

The discovery highlights a hidden world of parasitic microbial biodiversity, particularly within the DPANN archaea, to which *Sukunaarchaeum* belongs. Its true host and the function of a significant portion of its novel genes remain unknown, though they are speculated to mediate host interactions. Researchers believe many similar, ultra-minimal organisms might exist but are often overlooked by conventional genetic sequencing methods, suggesting a vast "iceberg" of microbial life that pushes the boundaries of what constitutes a living entity.
chinese_title: 一个极简到挑战生命定义的细胞
chinese_summary:
由Takuro Nakayama领导的科学家们发现了一种新的单细胞古菌，*Candidatus Sukunaarchaeum mirabile*，其基因组异常小，仅有238,000个碱基对。这种微生物独一无二，因为它几乎缺乏所有代谢基因，完全依赖宿主细胞进行营养加工和生长。这种极端的基因组简化挑战了生命的基本生物学定义，传统上，这些定义包括代谢自给自足。

*Sukunaarchaeum* 仅保留了自身复制所需的遗传成分，代表了一种极简形式的细胞生命。与其他基因组缩减但可能向宿主提供营养的共生微生物不同，*Sukunaarchaeum* 似乎是一种自我中心的寄生生物。尽管它高度依赖宿主，但它通过拥有自己的基因表达核心机制（包括核糖体）而与病毒不同。

这一发现揭示了一个隐藏的寄生微生物多样性世界，特别是在*Sukunaarchaeum* 所属的DPANN古菌中。它真正的宿主以及其大部分新颖基因的功能仍然未知，尽管推测这些基因可能介导宿主相互作用。研究人员认为，许多类似、超微型生物可能存在，但常常被传统的基因测序方法所忽视，这暗示着一个巨大的微生物生命“冰山”，它正在拓宽对生命实体构成的认知界限。

title: CS234: Reinforcement Learning Winter 2025
summary:
CS234: Reinforcement Learning, Winter 2025, taught by Emma Brunskill (with Chethan Bhateja as Head TA), introduces students to RL for autonomous systems, covering core challenges, generalization, exploration, and deep reinforcement learning.

Prerequisites include Python proficiency, College Calculus/Linear Algebra, Basic Probability/Statistics, and Foundations of Machine Learning (CS 221/229). Learning outcomes focus on defining and formulating RL problems, implementing common algorithms, and evaluating their performance, including the exploration vs. exploitation challenge.

Lectures are live Tuesdays and Thursdays (1:30-2:50pm PST), with videos available on Canvas. Communication is via Ed discussion forums for fastest responses. Assignments and grades are managed through Gradescope.

The course grade comprises three assignments (46%), a midterm (25%), a quiz (5%), and a course project (24%, including proposal, milestone, poster presentation, and paper), plus a 0.5% bonus for lecture poll participation. Students have 5 late days total (max 2 per assignment/project component, none for poster/final paper).

Academic integrity is paramount: students can discuss ideas but must write solutions independently. Generative AI tools like GPT-4 are permitted for ideation (like human collaboration) but not for direct solutions or code copying, and their use must be indicated. AI tools cannot be listed as project collaborators. The recommended textbook is "Reinforcement Learning: An Introduction" by Sutton and Barto (2nd Edition, free online).

title: Unifying our mobile and desktop domains
summary:
The Wikimedia Foundation has successfully unified its mobile and desktop domains, transitioning from separate `m.wikipedia.org` URLs to a single standard domain like `en.wikipedia.org`. This change, completed in October, eliminates the long-standing redirect for mobile users, which had been in place since 2011.

The separate mobile domain, once common, became outdated. Google's shift to a "mobile-first" crawler meant it no longer supported advertising distinct mobile URLs. This change caused a 10-20% regression in mobile response times for Google-referred traffic, as users were forced to wait for a redirect.

Unifying the domains has yielded significant benefits:
1.  **20% Faster Mobile Response Times:** Eliminating the redirect directly improved mobile page load speeds for all users, including recovering the regression experienced by Google-referred traffic. Persian Wikipedia, for instance, saw a 0.25-second improvement in response time.
2.  **Improved SEO:** Wikimedia Commons faced severe SEO issues, with millions of pages delisted and only half known to Google due to the redirect creating crawl loops. Disabling the redirect for Googlebot on Commons led to a 100% increase in Google-referred pageviews. Additionally, enabling sitemaps helped Google index 70 million new Commons pages, and video recognition improved.
3.  **Better Link Sharing UX:** Shared links from mobile devices previously hardcoded the mobile domain. Now, old mobile links automatically redirect to the standard domain, ensuring the appropriate site version is always displayed regardless of the recipient's device.
4.  **Reduced Infrastructure Load:** The separate domain caused duplicate cache purges for every edit. Unifying them cut the MediaWiki purge rate by 50%, reducing daily purges by approximately 4 billion and overall CDN purges by 20-40%.

This strategic unification modernizes Wikipedia's infrastructure, enhancing user experience, search engine visibility, and operational efficiency.
chinese_title: 统一移动端和桌面端
chinese_summary:
维基媒体基金会已成功统一其移动端和桌面端域名，从独立的`m.wikipedia.org`网址过渡到单一标准域名，如`en.wikipedia.org`。这项于十月完成的变更，消除了自2011年起针对移动用户存在的长期重定向。

曾一度常见的独立移动域名已过时。谷歌转向“移动优先”的抓取方式，意味着它不再支持广告独立的移动网址。这一变化导致谷歌引荐流量的移动响应时间下降10-20%，因为用户被迫等待重定向。

统一域名带来了显著的好处：
1.  **移动响应时间加快20%**：消除重定向直接提升了所有用户的移动页面加载速度，包括恢复了谷歌引荐流量所经历的下降。例如，波斯语维基百科的响应时间缩短了0.25秒。
2.  **改善了搜索引擎优化（SEO）**：维基共享资源面临着严重的SEO问题，数百万页面被取消索引，且只有一半被谷歌知晓，原因是重定向造成了抓取循环。禁用维基共享资源上的Googlebot重定向，使得谷歌引荐的页面浏览量增加了100%。此外，启用站点地图帮助谷歌索引了7000万个新的维基共享资源页面，且视频识别能力得到提升。
3.  **更好的链接分享用户体验（UX）**：移动设备分享的链接以前硬编码了移动域名。现在，旧的移动链接会自动重定向到标准域名，确保无论接收者使用何种设备，始终显示适当的站点版本。
4.  **降低了基础设施负载**：独立的域名导致每次编辑都会产生重复的缓存清除。统一这些域名将MediaWiki的清除率降低了50%，每天清除量减少了约40亿次，整体CDN清除量减少了20-40%。

这一战略性统一使维基百科的基础设施现代化，提升了用户体验、搜索引擎可见性和运营效率。

title: Mind-reading devices can now predict preconscious thoughts
summary:
Mind-reading devices, or brain-computer interfaces (BCIs), are rapidly evolving to predict preconscious thoughts. Early implanted BCIs, like the one used by Nancy Smith to play piano, translate imagined movements into actions, sometimes detecting intent hundreds of milliseconds before conscious awareness. Initially focused on the motor cortex to help paralyzed individuals control assistive technologies, newer "dual-implant" BCIs also access regions like the posterior parietal cortex, decoding more complex signals related to reasoning, attention, and planning, including internal dialogue.

Concurrently, wearable consumer neurotech, utilizing AI-enhanced electroencephalography (EEG), is improving. Though less precise than implants, these devices can reveal overall brain states like alertness or anxiety, with tech giants like Apple exploring their integration.

This rapid advancement raises significant ethical concerns. While clinical BCIs face medical regulations, the consumer neurotech space is largely unregulated, allowing companies broad control over user data. Ethicists worry about privacy violations, the sale of inferred personal data (e.g., mental health, political allegiances), and the impact on "cognitive liberty," describing it as "giving steroids to the existing data economy."

Governments and international bodies are starting to introduce laws and guidelines to protect neural data. The future of BCIs aims to delve deeper into subconscious thought precursors and potentially diagnose and treat psychiatric conditions by monitoring neural signatures and delivering targeted stimulation, emphasizing the critical need for robust safety and ethical frameworks.
chinese_title: 读心设备现已能够预测前意识思想。
chinese_summary:
读心设备，即脑机接口（BCI），正在迅速发展，以预测前意识思维。早期的植入式脑机接口，例如南希·史密斯曾用它弹奏钢琴，能将想象中的动作转化为实际行动，有时甚至在意识形成前数百毫秒就能检测到意图。这类设备最初主要关注运动皮层，以帮助瘫痪患者控制辅助技术，而新型的“双植入”脑机接口还能进入诸如顶叶后皮层等区域，解码与推理、注意力、规划相关的更复杂信号，包括内心独白。

与此同时，利用人工智能增强的脑电图（EEG）技术的可穿戴消费级神经技术也在不断改进。尽管不如植入设备精确，这些设备能揭示整体大脑状态，例如警觉性或焦虑，而苹果等科技巨头正在探索将其整合。

这种快速发展引发了重大的伦理担忧。临床脑机接口受医疗法规约束，而消费级神经技术领域则基本不受监管，允许公司对用户数据拥有广泛的控制权。伦理学家担忧隐私侵犯、推断出的个人数据（例如心理健康、政治立场）的出售，以及对“认知自由”的影响，形容其为“给现有数据经济注入类固醇”。

各国政府和国际机构正开始引入法律和指导方针，以保护神经数据。脑机接口的未来旨在更深入地探究潜意识思维的前兆，并通过监测神经信号和提供靶向刺激，可能诊断和治疗精神疾病，这凸显了建立健全的安全和伦理框架的迫切需求。

title: PRC elites voice AI-skepticism
summary:
The Jamestown Foundation article "PRC elites voice AI-skepticism" highlights a growing current of caution and doubt among influential figures in China regarding the transformative power and potential risks of Artificial Intelligence. Despite the prevalent narrative of China's aggressive pursuit of AI dominance, the piece reveals that many within the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) and military-civil fusion apparatus express significant reservations, ranging from technological limitations to profound societal and political implications.

These elites, including academics, strategists, and government advisors, voice concerns that AI's capabilities are often overhyped, and its development faces formidable technical hurdles, particularly regarding ethical dilemmas, bias, and control. They question AI's ability to truly replicate human creativity or judgment, fearing that an overreliance on AI could lead to strategic blunders or erode human agency. Furthermore, there are apprehensions about AI's potential to exacerbate social inequalities, destabilize employment, and even pose existential threats if not properly managed. This skepticism contrasts sharply with public declarations of AI optimism and suggests a more nuanced, cautious approach within the PRC's decision-making circles concerning the future trajectory and application of AI.
chinese_title: 中国精英质疑AI
chinese_summary:
詹姆斯敦基金会的文章《中国精英对人工智能持怀疑态度》指出，中国影响力人物中对于人工智能的变革力量和潜在风险，日益弥漫着谨慎和疑虑。尽管普遍认为中国在积极寻求人工智能主导地位，但该文章揭示，许多中国共产党（CCP）和军民融合体系内人士表达了严重的保留意见，其担忧从技术局限性延伸至深远的社会和政治影响。

这些精英，包括学者、战略家和政府顾问，表示人工智能的能力常常被过分夸大，其发展面临严峻的技术障碍，尤其是在道德困境、偏见和控制方面。他们质疑人工智能是否能真正复制人类的创造力或判断力，担心过度依赖人工智能可能导致战略失误或侵蚀人类主体性。此外，人们还担心人工智能如果管理不当，可能加剧社会不平等、破坏就业稳定，甚至构成生存威胁。这种怀疑论与公开宣称的AI乐观主义形成鲜明对比，并表明在中国决策圈内部，对于人工智能的未来发展轨迹和应用，存在着一种更为细致、谨慎的态度。

title: What they don't tell you about maintaining an open source project
summary:
The article "What they don't tell you about maintaining an open source project" by Andrej reveals the demanding realities behind maintaining a successful open-source project, often contrasting sharply with initial idealistic expectations. What starts as a passion project or a portfolio builder quickly evolves into an unpaid "second job," consuming significant time and emotional energy.

Maintainers are burdened with an array of tasks, from fixing bugs and reviewing pull requests to writing documentation and providing user support. Users, often unaware of the maintainer's personal constraints or lack of compensation, develop high expectations for prompt responses and continuous updates, leading to immense pressure. This constant demand, coupled with minimal financial recognition and occasional negative feedback, frequently leads to stress, frustration, and burnout.

The author describes this predicament as "golden handcuffs"; the project becomes too successful to abandon due to the maintainer's sense of responsibility towards its users, even if they no longer enjoy the work.

Ultimately, maintainers must confront difficult choices: find ways to monetize the project, attempt to transition it to community leadership, or deliberately scale back involvement, risking user dissatisfaction. The article advises aspiring open-source creators to carefully consider the potential burden of success and plan for sustainability or graceful exit strategies before committing to a project that might gain significant traction.
chinese_title: 维护开源项目不为人知的真相
chinese_summary:
Andrej的文章《他们没有告诉你的开源项目维护真相》揭示了维护一个成功开源项目背后严苛的现实，这往往与最初的理想化预期形成鲜明对比。最初作为一项充满激情的项目或个人作品集构建器，它很快演变成一份无偿的“第二份工作”，耗费大量时间和情感精力。

维护者们肩负着一系列任务，从修复错误和审查拉取请求到撰写文档和提供用户支持。用户通常不知道维护者的个人限制或其工作的无偿性，对及时响应和持续更新抱有很高的期望，这导致了巨大的压力。这种持续不断的需求，加上微薄的经济回报和偶尔的负面反馈，经常导致压力、沮丧和倦怠。

作者将这种困境描述为“金手铐”；项目变得过于成功而无法放弃，这源于维护者对用户的责任感，即使他们不再享受这份工作。

最终，维护者必须面对艰难的选择：找到项目盈利的方法，尝试将其移交给社区领导，或者有意缩减参与程度，但这会冒着用户不满的风险。文章建议有抱负的开源创作者在投入一个可能获得巨大关注的项目之前，仔细考虑成功可能带来的负担，并提前规划好可持续性或优雅的退出策略。

title: Statistical Process Control in Python
summary:
This article provides a practical guide to Statistical Process Control (SPC) in Python, focusing on measuring product quality variation and identifying when process intervention is needed. It leverages `pandas` for data manipulation, `plotnine` for visualizations, and `scipy` for statistical functions.

The workshop uses a case study of a Japanese hot spring (onsen) to demonstrate quality control, particularly for temperature, pH, and sulfur levels, which are critical for market positioning. After loading sample temperature data, the process begins with calculating descriptive statistics (mean, standard deviation).

Key SPC visualizations are introduced, starting with a process overview chart combining jitter plots and boxplots to show individual measurements and subgroup distributions over time, alongside a histogram for overall process variation.

For deeper analysis, subgroup statistics are calculated, including the mean (`xbar`), range (`r`), standard deviation (`sd`), and pooled within-subgroup standard deviation (`sigma_s`). These values are used to determine control limits for X-bar charts, which plot subgroup means over time against a center line (grand mean) and 3-sigma control limits to monitor process stability. A custom `ggprocess` function simplifies chart generation.

The article also covers moving range charts for situations with individual measurements (n=1), demonstrating how the absolute difference between consecutive measurements helps estimate and monitor process variation.

In conclusion, the guide equips users with the tools and understanding to produce SPC visuals and statistics in Python, enabling data-driven decisions for process improvement and control.
chinese_title: Python 统计过程控制
chinese_summary:
本文提供了Python中统计过程控制（SPC）的实用指南，重点在于衡量产品质量波动并确定何时需要进行过程干预。它利用`pandas`进行数据操作，`plotnine`进行可视化，以及`scipy`进行统计功能。

该研讨会使用日本温泉（onsen）的案例研究来演示质量控制，特别是针对温度、pH值和硫含量，这些对市场定位至关重要。加载样本温度数据后，过程从计算描述性统计数据（均值、标准差）开始。

引入了关键的SPC可视化，首先是一个过程概览图，它结合了抖动图和箱线图，以显示随时间变化的单个测量值和子组分布，同时还包含一个用于整体过程波动的直方图。

为了进行更深入的分析，计算了子组统计数据，包括均值（`xbar`）、极差（`r`）、标准差（`sd`）和合并的子组内标准差（`sigma_s`）。这些值用于确定X-bar图的控制限，X-bar图通过绘制随时间变化的子组均值与中心线（总均值）和3-sigma控制限，以监控过程稳定性。一个自定义的`ggprocess`函数简化了图表的生成。

本文还涵盖了针对单个测量值（n=1）情况的移动极差图，演示了连续测量值之间的绝对差如何帮助估计和监控过程波动。

总之，本指南为用户提供了在Python中生成SPC可视化和统计数据的工具和理解，从而能够做出数据驱动的决策，以改进和控制过程。

title: ICE Offers Up to $280M to Immigrant-Tracking 'Bounty Hunter' Firms
summary:
Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) is drastically expanding its plans to outsource immigrant tracking to private surveillance firms, moving beyond a previous $180 million pilot program. New contracting records reviewed by WIRED reveal that ICE has removed the overall spending cap for the initiative, increasing individual vendor limits to $281.25 million and guaranteeing an initial task order of at least $7.5 million per contractor.

This shift indicates that ICE now views this as a significant investment rather than an experiment, expecting prime contractors to act as a de facto arm of federal enforcement. These private firms, described as "bounty hunters," will confirm home and work addresses for individuals targeted for removal. Their methods will include photographing residences, documenting movements, staking out workplaces, and utilizing commercial data brokers and open-source research.

The program's scope is substantial, with contractors expected to handle monthly batches of 50,000 cases from a docket of 1.5 million people. Payment will be performance-based, offering a fixed price per case with additional bonuses for speed and accuracy. Although contractors will not directly access ICE's internal systems, they will receive exported case packets containing large volumes of sensitive personal data, operating outside public oversight.

This initiative is the latest in a series of Trump administration efforts to broaden the role of contractors in ICE's enforcement operations, following plans for private transportation networks, social media targeting centers, and a national call center. The increased financial guarantees are seen as necessary to ensure contractors marshal the significant workforce and infrastructure ICE demands.
chinese_title: 移民局向追踪移民的“赏金猎人”公司提供高达2.8亿美元资金
chinese_summary:
移民与海关执法局（ICE）正大幅扩大其将移民追踪外包给私人监控公司的计划，超越了此前1.8亿美元的试点项目。经WIRED审阅的新合同记录显示，ICE已取消了这项计划的总支出上限，将单个供应商的限额提高到2.8125亿美元，并保证每家承包商的初始任务订单至少为750万美元。

这一转变表明，ICE现在将其视为一项重大投资而非一项实验，期望主承包商充当联邦执法部门的实际延伸。这些被描述为“赏金猎人”的私人公司，将确认被指定驱逐人员的住址和工作地址。他们的方法将包括拍摄住宅、记录行动、监视工作场所，以及利用商业数据中介和开源研究。

该计划的范围巨大，承包商预计每月将处理一份150万人案件清单中的5万个案件。付款将基于绩效，按案件固定价格支付，并根据速度和准确性提供额外奖金。尽管承包商无法直接访问ICE的内部系统，但他们将收到导出的案件数据包，其中包含大量敏感个人数据，并在公共监督之外运作。

这项举措是特朗普政府一系列努力中的最新一项，旨在扩大承包商在ICE执法行动中的作用，此前已推出私人运输网络、社交媒体目标识别中心和全国呼叫中心等计划。增加的财政担保被认为是必要的，以确保承包商能够调集ICE所需的大量劳动力和基础设施。

title: Bad UX World Cup 2025
summary:
The "Bad UX World Cup 2025," presented by Nordcraft, recently concluded, crowning Dalia with "The Perfect Date Picker" as its champion.

The competition challenged participants to build a date picker with intentionally poor user experience – the worse, the better – while ensuring it was still technically possible to select a desired date. Submissions could use any web technology and had to be available via a publicly accessible URL.

Prizes for the winner included a "shittrophy" and a copy of Kevin Powell's "CSS Demystified" course. The judging panel comprised David Prentell, Cassidy Williams, and Kevin Powell himself.

Reactions to the event were diverse, ranging from "Stupid and unprofessional" (Reddit User) to "Repulsive yet intriguing" (Anders R. Møller), and even "brilliant and culturally resonant" (ChatGPT).
