title: The Bitter Lesson of LLM Extensions
summary:
The article chronicles the three-year evolution of LLM extensions, highlighting a "bitter lesson" learned. It began with ambitious ChatGPT Plugins (March 2023) for universal tool use via OpenAPI, which failed due to nascent models and poor UX, though the Code Interpreter foreshadowed future potential. Simpler methods like Custom Instructions (July 2023) and Custom GPTs (Nov 2023) focused on prompt engineering, while Memory (Feb 2024) introduced automatic personalization.

Cursor Rules (April 2024) integrated custom instructions directly into code repositories (`.cursorrules`), making extensions native. By late 2024, Model Context Protocol (MCP) emerged as a heavyweight client-server solution for robust tool integration, powerful but complex.

The key turning point is Agent Skills (Oct 2025), a simplified rebirth of plugins. Skills consist of markdown files and scripts in a directory, which the agent indexes and reads only when relevant. Critically, Agent Skills operate on the assumption that the agent has general-purpose computer access (e.g., bash) to *write and execute its own tools and scripts*.

This exemplifies the "bitter lesson": giving agents generic tools and trusting their intelligence to perform "glue work" and create specialized solutions on the fly is superior to pre-defining every specific tool. The author predicts future LLM applications will ubiquitously integrate an abstracted "computer," making natural language the most accessible extension mechanism and effectively replacing complex protocols like MCP.
chinese_title: 大语言模型扩展的惨痛教训
chinese_summary:
这篇文章记录了大型语言模型（LLM）扩展功能三年的演变，并强调了一个学到的“惨痛教训”。它始于2023年3月雄心勃勃的ChatGPT插件，旨在通过OpenAPI实现通用工具使用，但因模型尚不成熟和用户体验不佳而告失败，尽管其代码解释器预示了未来的潜力。2023年7月的自定义指令（Custom Instructions）和2023年11月的自定义GPTs（Custom GPTs）等更简单的方法则侧重于提示工程，而2024年2月的记忆功能（Memory）引入了自动个性化。

2024年4月的Cursor规则（Cursor Rules）将自定义指令直接集成到代码仓库（`.cursorrules`文件），使扩展功能变得更加原生。到2024年末，模型上下文协议（Model Context Protocol, MCP）作为一种重量级的客户端-服务器解决方案出现，用于实现强大的工具集成，但其强大也伴随着复杂。

关键转折点是2025年10月的智能体技能（Agent Skills），这是插件功能的简化版重生。技能由目录中的Markdown文件和脚本组成，智能体只在相关时才对其进行索引和读取。至关重要的是，智能体技能的运行前提是智能体拥有通用的计算机访问权限（例如Bash），能够*编写和执行自己的工具和脚本*。

这便是“惨痛教训”的体现：赋予智能体通用工具，并信任其智能来完成“粘合工作”并即时创建专业解决方案，这远优于预先定义每一个具体工具。作者预测，未来的LLM应用将普遍集成一个抽象的“计算机”，使自然语言成为最易用的扩展机制，并有效地取代MCP等复杂协议。

title: I DM'd a Korean presidential candidate and ended up building his core campaign
summary:
Jake Lee, a software engineer, details his unexpected journey building the core campaign platform for then-presidential candidate Yoon Suk-yeol, now South Korea's President. In 2021, frustrated by inadequate political apps, Lee directly messaged Yoon on Facebook, offering to create a superior digital communication channel.

Yoon's campaign suffered from outdated digital infrastructure and a lack of direct engagement with supporters. Lee's proactive outreach led to a rapid approval to build a solution. Within a week, he mobilized a volunteer team of engineers and designers to launch a direct communication platform. This system enabled citizens to submit policy suggestions, volunteer, donate, and participate in discussions, effectively bypassing traditional party structures and fostering grassroots involvement.

The quickly developed platform became instrumental to Yoon's campaign, facilitating significant public engagement, policy input, and volunteer coordination. Lee's initiative demonstrated the profound impact a single individual with technical skills can have on a major political campaign, showcasing the power of modern digital tools and direct, tech-driven engagement in mobilizing supporters and contributing to Yoon Suk-yeol's eventual electoral success.
chinese_title: 我私信了一位韩国总统候选人，结果为他打造了核心竞选班底。
chinese_summary:
软件工程师杰克·李（Jake Lee）详细讲述了他为当时的总统候选人（现任韩国总统）尹锡悦搭建核心竞选平台的意外历程。2021年，他对现有政治应用程序的不足感到沮丧，于是直接在Facebook上向尹锡悦发消息，主动提出要创建一个更优秀的数字沟通渠道。

尹锡悦的竞选活动饱受数字基础设施老旧、缺乏与支持者直接互动之苦。李的主动联络很快获得批准，着手构建解决方案。在一周内，他召集了一支由工程师和设计师组成的志愿者团队，启动了一个直接沟通平台。这个系统使公民能够提交政策建议、参加志愿活动、捐款以及参与讨论，有效地绕过了传统政党结构，促进了草根参与。

这个迅速开发的平台对尹锡悦的竞选活动至关重要，促进了大量的公众参与、政策建言和志愿者协调。李的这一举措展示了拥有技术技能的个人对一场重大政治竞选活动所能产生的深远影响，展现了现代数字工具以及直接、技术驱动的互动在动员支持者和为尹锡悦最终的选举成功做出贡献方面的力量。

title: Space Truckin' – The Nostromo (2012)
summary:
The article "Space Truckin' – The Nostromo" explores the intricate and often fraught design process of the *Nostromo* spacecraft for Ridley Scott's 1979 film, *Alien*. Director Ridley Scott aimed for a "used universe" aesthetic, influenced by the realism of *2001: A Space Odyssey* and the gritty, "seedy living" depicted in John Carpenter's *Dark Star*. This approach deliberately contrasted with the cleaner, more fantastical settings of *Star Wars*, emphasizing functionality and a "truck driver version" of space travel.

Writer Dan O'Bannon was instrumental in pushing this lived-in, industrial look, commissioning artists Ron Cobb and Chris Foss early in the production. Cobb, who also conceived the Alien's corrosive blood, produced numerous early designs for the ship, initially called the 'Snark.' Foss, known for his vibrant spacecraft paintings, also contributed a wealth of exterior concepts.

Despite months of work and a change of name to 'Nostromo,' a final design proved elusive. Scott, once on board, had a clear vision for a "slow moving, massive piece of steel." Ultimately, under pressure, special effects supervisor Brian Johnson chose Ron Cobb's 'Nostromo A' sketch as the basis for the model, which Scott then had repainted from yellow to grey. While Cobb's interior designs were largely accepted, Scott's firm direction often meant that earlier extensive work by artists like Foss was sidelined, causing some frustration among the creative team.
chinese_title: 太空货运 · 诺斯特罗莫 (2012)
chinese_summary:
文章《太空货运——诺斯特罗莫号》探讨了雷德利·斯科特1979年电影《异形》中“诺斯特罗莫号”宇宙飞船错综复杂且充满挑战的设计过程。导演雷德利·斯科特追求一种“旧宇宙”美学，这受到了《2001：太空漫游》的现实主义以及约翰·卡朋特电影《黑星》中描绘的粗粝、破败生活的影响。这种做法刻意与《星球大战》中更干净、更奇幻的设定形成对比，强调了功能性以及“卡车司机版”的太空旅行。

编剧丹·欧班农在推动这种充满生活气息的工业感外观方面发挥了关键作用，他在制作初期便委托艺术家罗恩·科布和克里斯·福斯进行设计。科布（他也是异形腐蚀性血液的构思者）为这艘飞船（最初名为“斯纳克号”）制作了大量早期设计。福斯（以其充满活力的宇宙飞船绘画而闻名）也贡献了丰富的外部设计概念。

尽管经过数月的工作并将名字改为“诺斯特罗莫号”，但最终设计却迟迟未能确定。斯科特一旦投入其中，便对一艘“缓慢移动的巨型钢铁块”有了清晰的构想。最终，在压力之下，特效总监布莱恩·约翰逊选择了罗恩·科布的“诺斯特罗莫A”草图作为模型的基础，斯科特随后将其从黄色重新漆成灰色。尽管科布的内部设计大体被接受，但斯科特坚定的方向往往意味着福斯等艺术家早先大量的工作被搁置一旁，这在创作团队中引起了一些沮丧情绪。

title: Ozempic does not slow Alzheimer's, study finds
summary:
A two-year study by its manufacturer, Novo Nordisk, has concluded that the popular weight-loss drug Ozempic does not slow the progression of Alzheimer's disease. This finding tempers earlier suggestions that the drug, known for reducing body weight in obese patients, might also slow various brain conditions, cancer, and other health issues.

Researchers had questioned whether any observed benefits were a direct effect of the drug or merely consequences of obesity reduction, or if health-conscious patients were a confounding factor. The study's results follow a similar outcome for Parkinson's disease, where Ozempic also failed to slow neurodegeneration.

Despite these setbacks in neurological conditions, the drug's positive impact on cardiovascular and kidney problems appears more robust. Following the announcement, Novo Nordisk's shares experienced a 6% decline.
chinese_title: 奥泽皮克不减缓阿尔茨海默病，研究发现
chinese_summary:
制造商诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）进行的一项为期两年的研究得出结论，广受欢迎的减肥药Ozempic（诺和泰）并不能减缓阿尔茨海默病（老年痴呆症）的进展。这一发现淡化了此前的一些猜测，即这种以帮助肥胖患者减轻体重而闻名的药物，可能还会减缓各种脑部疾病、癌症和其他健康问题的进展。

研究人员此前曾质疑，观察到的任何益处究竟是药物的直接作用，还是仅仅是肥胖减轻的后果，抑或是关注健康的患者本身就是一个混杂因素。这项研究结果与帕金森病（Parkinson's disease）的类似结果一致，在帕金森病的研究中，Ozempic也未能减缓神经退行性病变。

尽管在神经系统疾病方面遭遇挫折，但该药物对心血管和肾脏问题的积极影响似乎更为显著。消息公布后，诺和诺德的股价下跌了6%。

title: What you can get for the price of a Netflix subscription
summary:
The author decided to cancel their Netflix subscription, finding it underutilized and its content unengaging. For the approximate monthly cost of €19.99, they reallocated the funds to three different subscriptions that are used daily, promoting active engagement over passive consumption.

First, a **Zed Pro** subscription (~€10) enhances their coding experience, making a beloved hobby more enjoyable and encouraging more active participation. The core message here is to invest in tools that make hobbies appealing, motivating time spent on fulfilling activities.

Second, a **Kagi** subscription (~€5) provides an ad-free search experience. The author highlights the value of paying directly for a service used daily to avoid trading attention and enduring advertising, supporting products they genuinely value.

Finally, a cheap **Hetzner server** (~€4) offers a personal stake on the internet, which hosts their blog and encourages learning and engagement in building things.

In summary, the article advocates moving away from default streaming subscriptions. For the same money, individuals can build a suite of useful tools that enhance hobbies, minimize ad exposure, and empower creation and learning. The author also notes that the article was written without AI.

title: 1,700-year-old Roman sarcophagus is unearthed in Budapest
summary:
Archaeologists in Budapest have unearthed a remarkably well-preserved 1,700-year-old Roman sarcophagus, offering a rare window into the life of a young woman from the ancient settlement of Aquincum. Discovered in the Óbuda district, the limestone coffin was found hermetically sealed and untouched by looters, its lid still fixed with metal clamps and molten lead.

Upon opening, researchers found a complete skeleton, believed to be that of a young woman based on her size and grave goods. The sarcophagus contained dozens of artifacts, including two intact glass vessels, bronze figures, 140 coins, a bone hair pin, amber jewelry, and traces of gold-threaded fabric. These items represent gifts for her "eternal journey," reflecting Roman funerary customs and the profound care from her relatives.

Lead archaeologist Gabriella Fényes highlighted the rarity of such an intact, custom-made sarcophagus, suggesting the deceased was likely well-to-do or of higher social status. The coffin was located in a burial ground within an abandoned quarter of Aquincum, near a Roman aqueduct.

Anthropologists will now examine the woman's remains to determine her age, health, and origins, while a layer of mud from inside the coffin will be sifted for potential additional treasures like earrings. The discovery provides invaluable scientific insight and an emotionally resonant glimpse into ancient expressions of love and devotion.
chinese_title: 布达佩斯出土1700年罗马石棺
chinese_summary:
布达佩斯的考古学家发掘出一个保存完好的1700年历史的罗马石棺，这为我们了解古阿奎库姆（Aquincum）定居点一名年轻女性的生活提供了难得的窗口。这个石灰石棺椁在奥布达区被发现，当时它被密封完好，未遭盗墓者破坏，棺盖仍用金属夹和熔铅固定着。

打开后，研究人员发现了一具完整的骨骸，根据其尺寸和随葬品判断，应属于一名年轻女性。石棺内有数十件文物，包括两件完好无损的玻璃器皿、青铜小雕像、140枚硬币、一根骨发簪、琥珀首饰，以及金线织物的痕迹。这些物品象征着她“永恒旅程”的礼物，反映了罗马的丧葬习俗及其亲属的深切关怀。

首席考古学家加布里埃拉·费涅什（Gabriella Fényes）强调了这种完好无损的定制石棺的稀有性，这表明逝者很可能家境富裕或社会地位较高。该石棺位于阿奎库姆一个废弃区域内的墓地中，靠近一条罗马渡槽。

人类学家现在将检查这名女性的遗骸，以确定她的年龄、健康状况和出身，同时，石棺内的一层泥土也将被筛查，以寻找耳环等潜在的额外宝藏。这项发现提供了宝贵的科学见解，并让我们对古人表达爱与奉献的方式有了情感上的共鸣。

title: ZoomInfo CEO blocks researcher after documenting pre-consent biometric tracking
summary:
On November 25, 2025, security researcher Blackout Research documented extensive pre-consent biometric tracking on ZoomInfo's GTM Studio landing page, leading to the CEO, Henry Schuck, blocking the researcher after the findings were posted on LinkedIn.

The investigation revealed over 50 tracking requests firing before the consent banner loaded. Key findings include:
*   **Sardine.ai** biometrics enabled (`enableBiometrics: true` in decoded config), tracking mouse movements, typing patterns, and DNS fingerprinting.
*   **PerimeterX** fingerprinting and **IdentityMatrix.ai** also active, alongside session fingerprinting for fraud detection.
*   A total of **118 unique tracking domains** were contacted on a single page load.

The irony noted is that ZoomInfo, which markets GTM Studio to "identify person-level website visits," relies on three external identity vendors and extensive pre-consent tracking on its own product page.

For marketers, Blackout Research warns of significant implications: potential legal exposure from vendors, legal risk for "intent data" collected without consent, customers becoming plaintiffs, joint liability for vendor non-compliance (GDPR, CCPA, CIPA), and competitive disadvantage.

The CEO's response of blocking the researcher without disputing or clarifying the findings underscores the report's assertion that "You can block the researcher. You can't block the evidence." Blackout Research released a comprehensive evidence pack to ensure transparency regarding these practices.
chinese_title: ZoomInfo 首席执行官在研究员披露未经同意的生物识别追踪后将其拉黑
chinese_summary:
2025年11月25日，安全研究员Blackout Research记录了ZoomInfo的GTM Studio着陆页上存在大量未经用户同意的生物识别跟踪行为。调查结果发布到LinkedIn后，ZoomInfo的CEO Henry Schuck屏蔽了该研究员。

调查显示，在同意横幅加载之前，已有超过50个跟踪请求被触发。主要发现包括：
*   **Sardine.ai** 生物识别功能已启用（在解码配置中显示 `enableBiometrics: true`），用于跟踪鼠标移动、打字模式和DNS指纹。
*   **PerimeterX** 指纹识别和 **IdentityMatrix.ai** 也处于活跃状态，同时还伴有用于欺诈检测的会话指纹。
*   在单次页面加载中，总共联系了 **118个独特的跟踪域**。

值得注意的是，ZoomInfo将其GTM Studio产品宣传为“识别个人层面的网站访问”，然而讽刺的是，它却在其自己的产品页面上依赖三个外部身份供应商并进行大量未经同意的跟踪。

Blackout Research警告营销人员，这会带来重大影响：包括供应商潜在的法律风险、未经同意收集“意图数据”的法律风险、客户可能成为原告、因供应商不合规（GDPR、CCPA、CIPA）而产生的连带责任，以及竞争劣势。

CEO在未对调查结果提出异议或澄清的情况下屏蔽研究员的举动，更加突显了报告中的论断：“你可以屏蔽研究员，但你无法屏蔽证据。”Blackout Research为此发布了一份全面的证据包，以确保这些做法的透明度。

title: Kagi Hub Belgrade
summary:
Kagi has announced the opening of Kagi Hub Belgrade on November 21, 2025. This marks Kagi's first physical office, designed to double as a free coworking space for all Kagi members and the Kagi team. Located in the heart of Belgrade, Serbia, the modern, 250-square-meter office aims to create an offline space for users and the team to share feedback, ideas, and collaborate on building a better internet.

Bookings for Kagi members will be available from December 15th via hub.kagi.com. Members can reserve a spot for up to five days per month at no cost, gaining access to a quiet open-space work area with 25 ergonomic desks, fast Wi-Fi, free coffee and tea, a small kitchen, and a conference room (subject to availability). Belgrade was chosen strategically for its position at the crossroads of East and West, its thriving tech scene, and its historical significance to Kagi's founder and CEO. chinese_title: 贝尔格莱德卡吉中心
chinese_summary:

title: The Generative Burrito Test
summary:
The "Generative Burrito Test" is a benchmark created to evaluate the performance of various image generation models. Inspired by the "horse riding astronaut" meme and Simon's Pelican benchmark, the test uses burritos, which the author initially assumed would be easy for models to depict due to their common presence in training data.

However, the creator found that models struggled to accurately represent the complex, "smushed and smashed" nature of burrito ingredients. The test uses a single, standardized prompt: "A partially eaten burrito with cheese, sour cream, guacamole, lettuce, salsa, pinto beans, and chicken." A key methodology is the use of "fal defaults" for all generations, explicitly avoiding any human-in-the-loop (HIL) effort or prompt optimization to prevent "cheating" and ensure a raw assessment of model capability.

The article lists numerous models tested, including SD 1.5, Fast SDXL, Flux Schnell, Ideogram V2/V3, SD v3.5, Imagen4 Preview, and others, indicating a comprehensive comparison of how these generative AI models handle depicting common, yet visually complex, food items.

title: Cloudflare outage should not have happened
summary:
Eduardo Bellani critiques Cloudflare's November 18, 2025 outage, asserting their root cause analysis (RCA) misses the core lesson. The outage stemmed from a database query, integral to Cloudflare's Bot Management, which lacked a database name filter. When new permissions were granted, this query unexpectedly returned duplicate column entries from an underlying `r0` database, more than doubling the expected rows. The application code, unprepared for this increased data, subsequently crashed core systems.

While Cloudflare proposed reasonable preventative measures like hardening ingestion and implementing global kill switches, Bellani argues these address symptoms rather than the fundamental problem. He contends Cloudflare mistakes physical replication for preventing logical single points of failure, treating a logical problem as if it were physical. He notes their adoption of ClickHouse prioritizes speed over ensuring logical correctness and consistency.

Bellani attributes such outages to the "uncontrolled interaction between application logic and database schema." He advocates for preventing these issues "by construction" through analytical design. His recommendations include eliminating nullable fields, ensuring full database normalization, and utilizing formally verified application code. He concludes that adopting these "formal methods" and "relational rigor," though potentially unpopular, is crucial for critical systems to make failures "impossible by design," ultimately benefiting the internet.
chinese_title: Cloudflare宕机本不该发生。
chinese_summary:

尽管Cloudflare提出了合理的预防措施，例如强化数据摄取和实施全局终止开关，但Bellani认为这些措施治标不治本。他声称Cloudflare误将物理复制等同于防止逻辑单点故障，将一个逻辑问题当作物理问题来处理。他指出Cloudflare采用ClickHouse优先考虑速度，而非确保逻辑正确性和一致性。

Bellani将此类宕机归因于“应用程序逻辑与数据库模式之间不受控制的交互”。他主张通过分析设计，从“结构上”预防这些问题。他的建议包括消除可空字段、确保数据库完全规范化，以及使用经过形式化验证的应用程序代码。他总结道，尽管采用这些“形式化方法”和“关系严格性”可能不受欢迎，但对于关键系统而言，它们对于实现“设计上不可能发生”的故障至关重要，最终将造福互联网。

title: Is your Android TV streaming box part of a botnet?
summary:
Android TV streaming boxes like Superbox, sold at major retailers for a one-time fee of around $400, promise unlimited access to thousands of streaming services, bypassing monthly subscriptions. However, security experts warn these devices mandate intrusive software that forces users' networks to relay internet traffic for others, often for cybercrime activities like advertising fraud and account takeovers.

A Censys analyst found Superbox devices immediately contact China's Tencent QQ and a residential proxy service called Grass IO. While Grass IO promotes earning rewards by sharing bandwidth for AI research, its founder denies Superbox affiliation, stating the boxes exploit an unethical proxy network. Superbox devices also include powerful network analysis and remote access tools, and perform DNS hijacking. To access the "free" content, users must replace Google's official Play Store with an unofficial app store to download specific apps. Superbox disclaims responsibility, stating they only sell hardware.

This issue extends beyond Superbox. Google filed a "BadBox 2.0 Enterprise" lawsuit against a botnet of over 10 million Android streaming devices engaged in advertising fraud, often pre-installed with malware or infected during app downloads. The FBI has also warned that compromised IoT devices like these become part of the BADBOX 2.0 botnet, linked to IPidea (a rebrand of the sanctioned 911S5 Proxy), which facilitates billions in cybercrime including ad fraud and account takeovers.

The article concludes that while consumers may save on streaming fees, their internet connection is exploited for illicit activities, often without their knowledge, illustrating the maxim: "If something is free, you are the product."

Censys的一名分析师发现，Superbox设备会立即联系中国的腾讯QQ和一个名为Grass IO的住宅代理服务。尽管Grass IO宣传通过共享带宽进行AI研究来赚取奖励，但其创始人否认与Superbox有任何关联，并表示这些盒子利用的是一个不道德的代理网络。Superbox设备还包含强大的网络分析和远程访问工具，并执行DNS劫持。为了访问这些“免费”内容，用户必须用一个非官方应用商店取代谷歌官方的Play Store来下载特定应用。Superbox声明他们只销售硬件，以此推卸责任。

这个问题不仅仅局限于Superbox。谷歌对一个由超过1000万台安卓流媒体设备组成的僵尸网络提起了“BadBox 2.0 Enterprise”诉讼，该网络从事广告欺诈活动，这些设备通常预装了恶意软件或在应用下载过程中被感染。联邦调查局也警告称，像这类被入侵的物联网设备会成为BADBOX 2.0僵尸网络的一部分，该僵尸网络与IPidea（被制裁的911S5 Proxy的更名）相关联，助长了数十亿美元的网络犯罪，包括广告欺诈和账户盗用。

title: It is ok to say "CSS variables" instead of "custom properties"
summary:

Justifying this stance, the author points out that the official CSS module is named "CSS Custom Properties for Cascading Variables," and its specification URL slug is "css-variables." They are indeed variables, specifically "cascading variables," capable of changing dynamically through the cascade, being overridden, animated, and made responsive to conditions like viewport or container sizes. While also "custom properties," particularly when explicitly typed using `@property`, their variable nature is undeniable.

The author, tired after TPAC 2025, briefly states that CSS and HTML are programming languages. They conclude by mentioning a successful experiment and a planned future article.

为了证明这一立场，作者指出，官方CSS模块名为“CSS Custom Properties for Cascading Variables”，其规范URL别名为“css-variables”。它们确实是变量，特别是“层叠变量”，能够通过层叠动态改变、被覆盖、进行动画，并响应视口或容器大小等条件。虽然它们也是“自定义属性”，尤其是在使用`@property`明确声明类型时，但其变量本质是不可否认的。

title: Image Diffusion Models Exhibit Emergent Temporal Propagation in Videos
summary:
"Image Diffusion Models Exhibit Emergent Temporal Propagation in Videos" explores the latent capabilities of image diffusion models beyond their primary use in image generation, applying them to video analysis. The paper posits that the self-attention maps within these models implicitly capture rich semantic structures, acting as robust semantic label propagation kernels. These kernels facilitate pixel-level correspondences between relevant image regions.

By extending this mechanism across video frames, the authors derive a temporal propagation kernel, enabling zero-shot object tracking through segmentation. This leverages the diffusion model's inherent semantic understanding without explicit training for video tasks. To enhance the robustness and consistency of label propagation, the study employs test-time optimization strategies like DDIM inversion, textual inversion, and adaptive head weighting.

The research culminates in **DRIFT**, a framework for object tracking that utilizes a pretrained image diffusion model alongside SAM-guided mask refinement. DRIFT demonstrates state-of-the-art zero-shot performance on standard video object segmentation benchmarks, showcasing the emergent temporal propagation abilities of image diffusion models.

通过将这一机制扩展到视频帧之间，作者推导出了一个时间传播核，从而通过分割实现零样本目标跟踪。这利用了扩散模型固有的语义理解能力，而无需对视频任务进行显式训练。为了增强标签传播的鲁棒性和一致性，该研究采用了DDIM反演、文本反演和自适应头部加权等测试时优化策略。

这项研究最终形成了DRIFT，这是一个利用预训练图像扩散模型并结合SAM引导的掩码细化的目标跟踪框架。DRIFT在标准视频目标分割基准上展现了最先进的零样本性能，展示了图像扩散模型涌现的时间传播能力。

title: Windows GUI – Good, Bad and Pretty Ugly (2023)
summary:
This article reviews and ranks every major Windows Graphical User Interface (GUI) from 1985 to 2023, rating them on a scale of 1 to 10 Clippys based on their current aesthetic appeal.

**Windows 1.0 (1 Clippy)** and **2.0 (2.5 Clippys)** are deemed "ugly" and "unattractive" due to early graphical limitations. **Windows 3.0/3.1 (6 Clippys)** marked a significant leap with a coherent, pseudo-3D GUI and VGA support, appearing more professional. **Windows 95/98 (7.5 Clippys)** introduced iconic features like the Taskbar and Start button, refining the 3D bevelled look and remaining functional. **Windows 2000 (8 Clippys)** gained a slight edge for its sophisticated veneer and improved icons.

**Windows XP (6 Clippys)** is considered a "regression" with a "cartoony" and less serious look. **Windows Vista/7 (7.5 Clippys)** introduced a glossy 3D sheen and transparency (toned down in 7), aiming for a "grown up" aesthetic. **Windows 8 (5 Clippys)** and **8.1 (5.5 Clippys)** were major "steps back," criticized for their tablet-centric design, "ugly" tiles, and removal of the Start menu. **Windows 10 (6.5 Clippys)** was a "frankenOS" that tried to fix Windows 8 but felt unplanned, retaining a flat look.

**Windows 11 (8 Clippys)** is hailed as the most "refined" since 2000, praised for its cohesion, clean design, and rounded corners, aesthetically surpassing current macOS, despite some functional drawbacks.

The author identifies Windows 3.0, 95, Vista, and 11 as GUIs Microsoft "got right," while XP and 8 "struck out."
chinese_title: Windows GUI——好、坏与奇丑无比 (2023)

title: Await Is Not a Context Switch: Understanding Python's Coroutines vs. Tasks
summary:
This article addresses a common misunderstanding of Python's `async` model, especially for engineers familiar with JavaScript, C#, or Java. In those languages, `await` typically means "yield to the runtime/event loop," automatically implying a potential context switch and concurrency.

Python, however, distinguishes between:
1.  **Coroutines (`async def`):** These are merely state machines that, when awaited, execute *synchronously* within the current task until they *themselves* encounter an `awaitable` that isn't ready (e.g., `asyncio.sleep`). Awaiting a bare coroutine *does not* give control back to the event loop.
2.  **Tasks (`asyncio.create_task`):** Tasks are Python's actual unit of concurrency. The event loop only interleaves *tasks*. Awaiting a *task* (which represents scheduled work) *does* yield control to the event loop, allowing other tasks to run.

This crucial difference means concurrency only arises from tasks and only at explicit suspension points within those tasks. The presence of `async` or `await` alone doesn't guarantee interleaving. Consequently, locking is only necessary where shared data might be accessed concurrently across *tasks* at an actual suspension point. If a critical section contains no `await` calls, it's atomic relative to the event loop, regardless of being an `async` function.

Python's design, evolving from generators, provides fine-grained control over when interleaving can occur. Engineers should audit task creation and suspension points to determine where concurrency truly exists and where locks are genuinely needed.
chinese_title: Await 不是上下文切换：理解 Python 的协程与任务
chinese_summary:
本文旨在解决对 Python `async` 模型的一个常见误解，尤其是对于熟悉 JavaScript、C# 或 Java 的工程师而言。在这些语言中，`await` 通常意味着“将控制权交给运行时/事件循环”，自动暗示着潜在的上下文切换和并发。

然而，Python 在以下两者之间进行了区分：
1.  **协程 (`async def`)：** 它们仅仅是状态机，当被 `await` 时，会在当前任务中*同步*执行，直到它们*自身*遇到一个尚未准备就绪的 `awaitable` 对象（例如 `asyncio.sleep`）。`await` 一个裸协程*并不会*将控制权交还给事件循环。
2.  **任务 (`asyncio.create_task`)：** 任务是 Python 真正的并发单元。事件循环只会在*任务*之间进行交错。`await` 一个*任务*（它代表着已调度的工作）*确实会*将控制权交给事件循环，从而允许其他任务运行。

这一关键差异意味着并发仅源于任务，并且只在这些任务中明确的挂起点才会发生。单纯的存在 `async` 或 `await` 并不能保证交错执行。因此，只有当共享数据可能在*任务*之间，并且在实际挂起点被并发访问时，才需要加锁。如果一个临界区不包含任何 `await` 调用，那么它相对于事件循环而言是原子的，无论它是否是一个 `async` 函数。

Python 的设计从生成器演变而来，提供了对何时可以发生交错执行的细粒度控制。工程师应该审查任务的创建点和挂起点，以确定并发真正存在于何处以及真正需要锁的地方。

title: There may not be a safe off-ramp for some taking GLP-1 drugs, study suggests
summary:
A recent analysis published in JAMA Internal Medicine suggests that discontinuing GLP-1 weight-loss medications like tirzepatide (Zepbound) leads to significant weight regain and a reversal of health benefits for most users. This prompts experts to propose these be rebranded as "weight management" drugs, likely requiring indefinite use, similar to medications for other chronic conditions.

The study observed 670 participants with obesity or overweight who took tirzepatide for 36 weeks. Those who lost at least 10% of their body weight were then randomized to either continue the drug or switch to a placebo for another 52 weeks, while maintaining diet and exercise. Of the 308 participants who initially benefited, 82% regained at least 25% of their lost weight by week 88. Furthermore, 57% regained over half, and 24% regained over three-quarters. This weight regain was accompanied by a reversal of cardiovascular and metabolic improvements, including increased blood pressure, cholesterol, hemoglobin A1c, and fasting insulin.

While a small group (17.5%) did not regain significant weight, the reasons remain unclear. The study involved abrupt drug withdrawal, highlighting the need for research into gradual weaning strategies and the potential health impacts of weight fluctuations.

Experts Elizabeth Oczypok and Timothy Anderson conclude that clinicians and patients should view these anti-obesity medications as long-term therapies, much like other chronic disease treatments.

title: Indie game developers have a new sales pitch: being 'AI free'
summary:
Indie game developers are increasingly adopting an "AI-free" sales pitch to differentiate themselves, emphasizing that their games are entirely human-made. This pushback emerged after Nexon CEO Junghun Lee suggested all game companies now use AI, which many indie developers vehemently denied.

For developers like Alex Kanaris-Sotiriou of Polygon Treehouse, avoiding generative AI is an ethical stance against using others' work without permission, and a marketing tool to connect with players who value authentic creation. Kanaris-Sotiriou co-created a free, golden cog-shaped seal stating, "This developer assures that no gen AI was used in this indie game," which is appearing on various indie game store pages. Other studios, such as D-Cell Games, issue passionate statements confirming "absolutely everything" in their games was created by human beings, deeming AI a "waste of effort" that doesn't meet their quality standards.

This stance contrasts with major publishers like EA, Microsoft, and Ubisoft, who are integrating gen AI to streamline development, reduce costs, and accelerate game releases, with titles like *Call of Duty: Black Ops 6* and *Arc Raiders* using AI assets. However, indie developers argue that their constraints foster genuine creative solutions, making the human development process inherently rewarding. While acknowledging AI's growing presence, they believe their commitment to human-made content resonates deeply with players and communities.

title: This blog is now hosted on a GPS/LTE modem (2021)
summary:
The author discovered that the PinePhone's Quectel EG25-G GPS/LTE modem exposes an Android Debug Bridge (ADB) interface, allowing root shell access to its entirely separate, closed-source Linux 3.18.44 operating system. Capitalizing on this, the author decided to host their static file blog directly on the modem.

They cross-compiled `darkhttpd`, a lightweight web server, for ARMv7 and pushed it along with the blog assets to the modem's 50MB writable `/usrdata` partition via ADB. After configuring ADB forwarding and `iptables`, the blog was successfully accessible on the PinePhone's local network.

Throughput tests showed approximately 11.4 Mbits/sec over the ADB-forwarded connection. The article concludes by highlighting significant security implications: the ease of obtaining root access and potential command injection vulnerabilities could enable persistent malware. Such malware could survive host OS reinstalls, potentially snooping on communications or tracking location, although direct interaction with the host OS is limited.

title: Show HN: A WordPress plugin that rewrites image URLs for near-zero-cost delivery
summary:
"Bandwidth Saver" is a WordPress plugin that optimizes website performance by delivering images from Cloudflare’s global content delivery network (CDN), utilizing Cloudflare R2 for near-zero-cost data transfer. It aims to reduce page load times and bandwidth consumption by serving images from the nearest server to each visitor.

Key features include:
*   **Zero Egress Fees:** Built on Cloudflare R2, eliminating data transfer costs.
*   **One-Click Setup (Managed Mode):** No Cloudflare account or complex configuration needed.
*   **Broad Compatibility:** Works with all major themes, page builders (Gutenberg, Elementor), and caching/optimization plugins (ShortPixel, WP Rocket).
*   **Bulletproof Fallback:** Images automatically load from your server if the CDN is unavailable.
*   **Automatic Rewriting:** Plugin rewrites image URLs to point to Cloudflare, caching them on the first visit.

Users can choose between two modes:
1.  **Managed (Recommended):** $2.99/month for unlimited images and bandwidth, with ImgPro handling infrastructure.
2.  **Self-Hosted (Free):** Users deploy to their own Cloudflare account, offering full control and typically costing nothing on the free tier. The Cloudflare Worker is open source.

The plugin focuses on delivery, not optimization, and works seamlessly with existing image compression or WebP conversion tools. It respects privacy, collecting no visitor data, cookies, or analytics. Installation is simple for the Managed option. Currently in early development (v0.1.3) with few installations, it supports WordPress 6.2+ and PHP 7.4+.

title: A Vibe Coded SaaS Killed My Team
summary:
The author details the impending shutdown of their company, which, facing declining revenue and over-hiring, opted for a drastic pivot instead of a graceful wind-down. Investors chose to migrate to a third-party "vibe coded" SaaS platform, hoping to eliminate almost all headcount (engineering, implementation, support) and rely on contracted sales. The author is tasked with a solo migration for an additional month or two before also being laid off.

During brief testing, the author immediately identified severe legal risks: the SaaS, developed by a foreign team without US customers, violates major US laws including CCPA, CPRA, TCPA, CAN-SPAM, and ADA. Functionally, the platform is severely broken, exemplifying "vibe coding"—ignoring actual code in favor of LLM prompting. It features non-functional buttons, broken modals, superficial UI elements, and critical business flaws, like allowing orders without payment or contact details.

The author laments that leadership was "bamboozled" by the app's superficial appearance. While accepting the company's financial failure as the root cause, the author struggles to accept being displaced due to legally non-compliant and fundamentally broken software. The article concludes with a warning about the dangers of using LLM-generated code without expert oversight, predicting more "negligent software" will negatively impact lives. title: DRAM prices are spiking, but I don't trust the industry's why
summary:
DRAM prices have surged globally in 2025, with DDR5 memory modules doubling and overall contract prices increasing by 171.8% in Q3 compared to the previous year. This spike affects consumers, PC builders, OEMs, and cloud providers, with reports of price quadrupling, rationing, and rising costs for NAND flash and HDDs.

The industry attributes this to booming demand from AI data centers, which require immense amounts of memory and storage, coupled with constrained supply. Manufacturers had cut production during a previous downturn (2022) and are now prioritizing High Bandwidth Memory (HBM) due to higher profit margins, diverting capacity from standard DRAM. They are also hesitant to significantly increase overall production, fearing a potential AI bubble burst.

However, the author expresses skepticism, noting the memory industry's history of price-fixing. The DRAM market is an oligopoly dominated by Samsung, SK Hynix, and Micron, all of whom were fined for collusion in the early 2000s. While a more recent 2016-2018 class-action lawsuit failed, suspicion remains. The author points out that these "big three" are currently reporting record profits from the shortages and are not rushing to expand standard DRAM capacity. Instead, they are collectively taking a "cautious" approach: prioritizing HBM, phasing out DDR4, delaying new fab projects, and avoiding price wars. This synchronized, profit-preserving strategy, combined with past precedents, suggests potential tacit coordination that benefits the dominant players, even if AI demand is a real factor. The situation is not expected to improve for at least another year.
chinese_title: DRAM价格暴涨，但我并不信任行业给出的理由。
chinese_summary:
2025年全球DRAM价格飙升，DDR5内存模组价格翻倍，且第三季度整体合约价格同比上涨171.8%。此次涨价影响了消费者、PC制造商、OEM厂商和云服务提供商，有报道称，价格翻了两番，出现配给制，NAND闪存和硬盘驱动器（HDD）的成本也在上升。

业内将此归因于人工智能数据中心对海量内存和存储的旺盛需求，加上供应受限。制造商在之前的低迷期（2022年）削减了产量，现在则由于更高的利润率，优先生产高带宽内存（HBM），从而将产能从标准DRAM转移开。他们也犹豫是否大幅增加整体产量，担心潜在的人工智能泡沫破裂。

然而，作者对此表示怀疑，并指出内存行业有操纵价格的历史。DRAM市场是由三星、SK海力士和美光主导的寡头垄断，他们都在21世纪初因串通（价格共谋）而被罚款。尽管2016-2018年的一项集体诉讼失败了，但怀疑依然存在。作者指出，这“三大巨头”目前正从短缺中获得创纪录的利润，并且不急于扩大标准DRAM产能。相反，他们正在集体采取一种“谨慎”的方法：优先生产HBM，逐步淘汰DDR4，推迟新的晶圆厂项目，并避免价格战。这种同步的、维护利润的策略，加上过去的先例，表明即使人工智能需求是一个真实因素，也可能存在有利于主导厂商的潜在默契协调。预计这种情况至少在未来一年内不会有所改善。

title: Microsoft doesn't understand the dislike for Windows' new direction
summary:
Microsoft is facing significant user backlash over its new "agentic" Windows direction, which aims to deeply embed AI (Copilot) throughout the operating system, making AI responsible for much of the decision-making and heavy lifting. Despite widespread user disapproval, the company, including its AI CEO Mustafa Suleyman, appears puzzled by the negative reception.

Users are clearly articulating their objections: their issue isn't with AI itself, but with its forced and pervasive integration into every facet of Windows—such as the taskbar, filesystem, and browser. Critics argue that Microsoft is "injecting a solution into a 'problem' that doesn't exist" and emphasize that they do not want AI spread ubiquitously across the OS. Instead, they advocate for targeted AI implementation within specific applications where it offers genuine value and solves concrete problems.

The article highlights a disconnect between Microsoft's internal conviction that "AI is no longer optional" and user demand for more focused AI utility. It cautions that if Microsoft continues to disregard user feedback and aggressively pursue its agentic vision, it risks alienating its user base rather than building loyalty.
chinese_title: 微软不理解对 Windows 新方向的反感。
chinese_summary:
微软正因其新的“代理式”Windows方向而面临用户的强烈反对，该方向旨在将AI（Copilot）深度嵌入到整个操作系统中，使AI负责大部分决策和繁重工作。尽管用户普遍不赞同，该公司，包括其AI首席执行官穆斯塔法·苏莱曼，似乎对这种负面反响感到困惑。

用户明确表达了他们的反对意见：他们的问题不在于AI本身，而在于它被强制性且无处不在地整合到Windows的各个方面——例如任务栏、文件系统和浏览器。批评人士认为，微软正在“将解决方案强行注入一个不存在的‘问题’中”，并强调他们不希望AI无处不在地扩散到整个操作系统中。相反，他们主张在AI能提供真正价值并解决具体问题的特定应用程序中，进行有针对性的AI实施。

文章强调了微软内部“AI不再是可选项”的信念与用户对更聚焦的AI实用性需求之间的脱节。文章警告说，如果微软继续无视用户反馈并积极推行其代理式愿景，它将面临疏远用户群而非建立忠诚度的风险。

title: Justice dept. requires RealPage end sharing competitively sensitive information
summary:
The Justice Department's Antitrust Division has filed a proposed settlement with RealPage Inc., a provider of revenue management software for rental housing, to end anticompetitive practices. RealPage is accused of using nonpublic, competitively sensitive information shared by landlords to set rental prices, limiting price decreases, and aligning pricing among competitors, often facilitated through its software and company-hosted meetings.

The proposed consent judgment aims to restore free market competition by requiring RealPage to:
*   Stop using competitors' nonpublic, real-time data for determining rental prices.
*   Limit software model training to historic nonpublic data aged at least 12 months.
*   Cease using models for geographic effects narrower than a state level.
*   Remove or redesign features that limited price decreases or aligned pricing.
*   Stop conducting market surveys for sensitive information and refrain from discussing nonpublic data or pricing strategies in meetings.
*   Accept a court-appointed monitor for compliance.
*   Cooperate in the ongoing lawsuit against property management companies.

This action underscores the Justice Department's commitment to vigorous antitrust enforcement against algorithmic coordination and information sharing. The public has 60 days to comment on the proposed settlement, as required by the Tunney Act.
chinese_title: 司法部要求瑞尔佩奇停止共享竞争敏感信息
chinese_summary:
司法部反垄断司已向为租赁住房提供收益管理软件的公司RealPage Inc.提交了一项拟议和解协议，以终止反竞争行为。RealPage被指控利用房东分享的非公开、竞争敏感信息来设定租金价格、限制价格下降，并协调竞争对手之间的定价，这通常是通过其软件和公司主办的会议促成的。

这项拟议的同意判决旨在通过要求RealPage采取以下措施来恢复自由市场竞争：
*   停止使用竞争对手的非公开实时数据来确定租金价格。
*   将软件模型训练限制为至少12个月前的历史非公开数据。
*   停止使用范围小于州级的地理效应模型。
*   移除或重新设计限制价格下降或协调定价的功能。
*   停止进行敏感信息市场调查，并在会议中避免讨论非公开数据或定价策略。
*   接受法院指定的合规监督员。
*   配合正在进行的针对物业管理公司的诉讼。

这项行动强调了司法部对算法协调和信息共享行为进行严格反垄断执法的承诺。根据《滕尼法案》的要求，公众有60天时间对拟议和解协议发表评论。

title: BebboSSH: SSH2 implementation for Amiga systems (68000, GPLv3)
summary:
BebboSSH is a GPLv3+ licensed SSH2 implementation for Amiga systems (68000+), offering modern secure shell, SCP, and SFTP capabilities. It comprises a full suite of tools: `bebbosshd` (server), `bebbossh` (client), `bebboscp` (file transfer), and `bebbosshkeygen` (Ed25519 key generator), along with cryptographic libraries (`libcryptossh.library`).

The software supports contemporary ciphers like curve25519-sha256, ssh-ed25519, aes128-gcm@openssh.com, and chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com, requiring a compatible modern server and `bsdsocket.library` (e.g., AmiTCP).

While functional on unaccelerated Amigas (68000), where connections may take about a minute, BebboSSH is optimized for faster CPUs. Performance significantly improves with accelerators, with SCP transfer speeds reaching up to 396 kB/s on a V4SA/68080 when using the `libcryptossh.library020`.

Features include config file support, key authentication, port forwarding, and terminal emulation (recommending `xterm-amiga` terminfo). BebboSSH has continuously evolved from its "AmigaSSH" roots, focusing on speed improvements and modern cipher integration. The documentation also provides essential configuration tips and troubleshooting for common issues, ensuring modern, secure network connectivity for classic Amiga hardware.
chinese_title: BebboSSH：Amiga 系统上的 SSH2 实现 (68000, GPLv3)
chinese_summary:
BebboSSH 是一款获得 GPLv3+ 许可的 Amiga 系统 (68000+ 处理器) SSH2 实现，提供现代安全 Shell、SCP 和 SFTP 功能。它包含一整套工具：`bebbosshd` (服务器端)、`bebbossh` (客户端)、`bebboscp` (文件传输) 和 `bebbosshkeygen` (Ed25519 密钥生成器)，以及加密库 (`libcryptossh.library`)。

该软件支持 curve25519-sha256、ssh-ed25519、aes128-gcm@openssh.com 和 chacha20-poly1305@openssh.com 等现代密码，需要兼容的现代服务器和 `bsdsocket.library` (例如 AmiTCP)。

尽管在未加速的 Amiga (68000 处理器) 上也能正常运行，但连接可能需要大约一分钟，BebboSSH 已针对更快的 CPU 进行了优化。使用加速器时性能显著提升，当使用 `libcryptossh.library020` 时，在 V4SA/68080 上 SCP 传输速度可达 396 kB/s。

功能包括配置文件支持、密钥认证、端口转发和终端仿真 (推荐使用 `xterm-amiga` terminfo)。BebboSSH 从其“AmigaSSH”的根源持续发展，专注于速度提升和现代密码集成。文档还提供必要的配置技巧和常见问题的故障排除，确保经典 Amiga 硬件的现代安全网络连接。

title: Voyager 1 approaches one light day from Earth
summary:
NASA's Voyager 1 probe is nearing a historic milestone, projected to become the first spacecraft to be one light-day from Earth by November 15, 2026. At this point, it will be approximately 16.1 billion miles (25.9 billion km) away, meaning a radio signal from Earth will take 24 hours to reach it.

The article highlights the vastness of space and the implications of the speed of light for communication. While light travels at 186,000 miles per second, distances in space cause significant delays: 2.6 seconds to the Moon, up to four minutes to Mars, and 6.8 hours to Pluto. Such delays necessitate highly autonomous robotic spacecraft for deep space missions.

Launched in 1977, Voyager 1 is nearly 50 years old and continues to function despite harsh conditions, though its nuclear power source is expected to fail in the next year or so. Currently, it is 15.7 billion miles (25.3 billion km) from Earth, with a one-way communication delay of over 23 hours.

Both Voyager probes remain in contact with Mission Control via NASA's Deep Space Network. However, reaching the one-light-day mark for Voyager 1 will mean that any commands sent will require a full two days for acknowledgment, posing an unprecedented challenge for space agency engineers.
chinese_title: 航海家1号临近距地球一光日
chinese_summary:
美国宇航局的旅行者1号探测器正接近一个历史性的里程碑，预计将于2026年11月15日成为第一个距离地球一光日远的航天器。届时，它将距离地球约161亿英里（259亿公里），这意味着来自地球的无线电信号将需要24小时才能到达它。

这篇文章强调了太空的浩瀚以及光速对通信的影响。尽管光以每秒18.6万英里的速度传播，但太空中的距离造成了显著的延迟：到月球需要2.6秒，到火星最长需要四分钟，到冥王星需要6.8小时。这种延迟使得深空任务必须使用高度自主的机器人航天器。

旅行者1号于1977年发射，至今已有近50年的历史，尽管环境恶劣，它仍在继续运行，不过其核电源预计将在未来一年左右失效。目前，它距离地球157亿英里（253亿公里），单向通信延迟超过23小时。

两艘旅行者探测器都通过美国宇航局的深空网络与任务控制中心保持联系。然而，旅行者1号一旦达到一光日的距离，发送的任何指令都将需要整整两天才能收到确认，这对航天机构的工程师们构成了前所未有的挑战。

title: From blood sugar to brain relief: GLP-1 therapy slashes migraine frequency
summary:
GLP-1 receptor agonist therapy, initially used for type 2 diabetes and obesity, shows significant promise in reducing migraine frequency, according to new research presented at the American Headache Society Annual Scientific Meeting.

A retrospective study analyzing 152 migraine patients, 90 of whom were on GLP-1 agonists like semaglutide or liraglutide, found that those on GLP-1 therapy experienced a 44% reduction in monthly migraine days (MMD) after three months. The average MMD dropped from 10.8 to 6.3 days. Patients with chronic migraine saw an even greater reduction of 61.5%. Nearly 8% of GLP-1 users achieved a 100% reduction in MMD, becoming migraine-free.

Another smaller retrospective study of 50 patients similarly reported a 50% reduction in MMD and headache days, alongside improvements in headache intensity and duration.

The mechanism behind this effect is not fully understood but may involve GLP-1 agonists' anti-inflammatory properties, their impact on weight loss, blood sugar regulation, and potential neuroprotective effects. These drugs are known to reduce systemic inflammation and oxidative stress, which are implicated in migraine pathophysiology.

While these real-world studies are retrospective and observational, suggesting a strong correlation, they highlight a potential new therapeutic avenue for migraine prevention. Further prospective, randomized controlled trials are needed to confirm these findings and elucidate the precise mechanisms.
chinese_title: 从血糖到大脑缓解：GLP-1疗法锐减偏头痛发作频率
chinese_summary:
根据在美国头痛学会年会上发布的新研究，GLP-1受体激动剂疗法（最初用于治疗2型糖尿病和肥胖症）在减少偏头痛发作频率方面显示出巨大潜力。

一项分析了152名偏头痛患者的回顾性研究（其中90名正在服用司美格鲁肽或利拉鲁肽等GLP-1激动剂）发现，接受GLP-1疗法的患者在三个月后，月偏头痛天数（MMD）减少了44%。平均MMD从10.8天降至6.3天。慢性偏头痛患者的MMD降幅更大，达到61.5%。近8%的GLP-1使用者实现了MMD的100%减少，从而完全摆脱了偏头痛。

另一项针对50名患者的较小规模回顾性研究也报告了MMD和头痛天数减少了50%，同时头痛强度和持续时间也得到改善。

这种作用机制尚未完全阐明，但可能涉及GLP-1激动剂的抗炎特性、其对体重减轻、血糖调节以及潜在的神经保护作用。已知这些药物能减少全身炎症和氧化应激，而这些都被认为与偏头痛的病理生理学有关。

尽管这些真实世界研究是回顾性和观察性的，表明存在强烈的相关性，但它们突显了偏头痛预防的一个潜在新治疗途径。需要进一步的前瞻性、随机对照试验来证实这些发现并阐明精确的作用机制。

title: Notes on the Troubleshooting and Repair of Computer and Video Monitors
summary:
"Notes on the Troubleshooting and Repair of Computer and Video Monitors" (Version 3.22, 2009) by Samuel M. Goldwasser is a comprehensive guide to diagnosing and repairing CRT-based displays. It begins by emphasizing critical safety precautions, especially concerning high voltage and CRT implosion risks, before outlining monitor fundamentals, characteristics, and subsystems.

The document systematically covers troubleshooting, categorizing problems by monitor component: low voltage power supply (e.g., dead monitors, fuse issues), deflection (e.g., size, position, sync problems, horizontal output transistor failures), high voltage power supply (e.g., no high voltage, arcing, focus issues), and raster/color/video (e.g., blank screens, color imbalances, retrace lines, poor focus). It provides detailed instructions for various internal adjustments, including focus, purity, convergence, and geometry.

Practical advice is offered on preventive maintenance, test equipment, capacitor discharge, and getting inside a monitor safely. Miscellaneous issues, such as interference, power saving problems, physical damage, and specific monitor model quirks, are also addressed. The guide concludes with extensive "Items of Interest," covering monitor specifications, video standards, lifespans, screen burn-in prevention, and "Service Information," including resources for schematics, parts, and advanced troubleshooting, making it an invaluable resource for monitor repair.
chinese_title: 计算机和视频显示器故障排除与维修笔记
chinese_summary:
Samuel M. Goldwasser 撰写的《电脑和视频显示器故障排除与维修笔记》（3.22版，2009年）是一本关于诊断和维修基于CRT（阴极射线管）显示器的综合指南。它首先强调了重要的安全预防措施，特别是关于高压和CRT内爆的风险，然后概述了显示器的基本原理、特性和子系统。

该文档系统地涵盖了故障排除，按显示器组件对问题进行分类：低压电源（例如，显示器无电源、保险丝问题）、偏转电路（例如，尺寸、位置、同步问题、行输出晶体管故障）、高压电源（例如，无高压、电弧、聚焦问题）以及光栅/色彩/视频（例如，黑屏、色彩不平衡、回扫线、聚焦不良）。它提供了各种内部调整的详细说明，包括聚焦、纯度、会聚和几何校正。

文中提供了关于预防性维护、测试设备、电容器放电以及安全拆开显示器的实用建议。还讨论了各种杂项问题，例如干扰、省电问题、物理损坏以及特定显示器型号的怪癖。该指南最后附有大量“感兴趣的条目”，涵盖了显示器规格、视频标准、使用寿命、屏幕老化（烧屏）预防，以及“服务信息”，包括原理图、零件和高级故障排除的资源，使其成为显示器维修的宝贵资源。

title: MIT study finds AI can replace 11.7% of U.S. workforce
summary:
An MIT study, conducted with Oak Ridge National Laboratory, reveals that artificial intelligence can already replace 11.7% of the U.S. workforce, equating to roughly $1.2 trillion in wages across sectors like finance, healthcare, and professional services.

The research utilized a sophisticated labor simulation tool called the "Iceberg Index," which acts as a "digital twin" for the U.S. labor market. It maps 151 million workers across 923 occupations and 3,000 counties, identifying specific skills that current AI systems can perform.

The study distinguishes between the "visible tip" of the iceberg – tech-related layoffs (2.2% of wage exposure or $211 billion) – and the much larger total exposure (11.7% or $1.2 trillion), which includes often-overlooked routine functions in human resources, logistics, finance, and office administration.

The Iceberg Index is not a job-loss prediction engine but a skills-centered snapshot designed to help policymakers proactively explore "what-if" scenarios. It provides a detailed map of potential disruption down to the zip code, allowing states to test interventions and prioritize reskilling investments before committing significant resources.

Crucially, the index challenges the assumption that AI risk is confined to coastal tech hubs, showing exposed occupations spread across all 50 states, including inland and rural regions. States like Tennessee, North Carolina, and Utah are already partnering with the researchers, using the interactive simulation environment to develop and validate their AI workforce action plans. The tool enables policymakers to identify exposure hotspots, tailor training programs, and understand AI's potential impact on local employment and GDP.
chinese_title: 麻省理工研究：AI可取代11.7%美国劳动力
chinese_summary:
麻省理工学院与橡树岭国家实验室联合开展的一项研究揭示，人工智能已能取代美国11.7%的劳动力，相当于金融、医疗保健和专业服务等领域约1.2万亿美元的工资。

该研究利用了一个名为“冰山指数”（Iceberg Index）的复杂劳动力模拟工具，该工具是美国劳动力市场的“数字孪生”。它绘制了覆盖923个职业、3000个县的1.51亿名工人，并识别出当前人工智能系统能够执行的特定技能。

该研究区分了冰山的“可见尖端”——与科技相关的裁员（占工资暴露度的2.2%，即2110亿美元）——以及更庞大的总暴露度（11.7%，即1.2万亿美元），后者包含了人力资源、物流、金融和办公室行政等领域常被忽视的日常职能。

“冰山指数”并非失业预测引擎，而是一个以技能为中心的快照，旨在帮助政策制定者主动探索“假设情景”。它提供了精确到邮政编码的潜在颠覆的详细地图，使各州能够在投入大量资源之前测试干预措施并优先考虑再培训投资。

至关重要的是，该指数挑战了人工智能风险仅限于沿海科技中心的假设，表明受影响的职业遍布全美50个州，包括内陆和农村地区。田纳西州、北卡罗来纳州和犹他州等州已与研究人员合作，利用互动模拟环境来制定和验证其人工智能劳动力行动计划。该工具使政策制定者能够识别风险热点、量身定制培训项目，并了解人工智能对当地就业和GDP的潜在影响。

title: EU council reaches position on Chat Control
summary:
The EU Council adopted its negotiating position (general approach) on a proposed regulation to prevent and combat child sexual abuse (CSA) online on June 20, 2024. The aim is to enhance child protection and ensure perpetrators are prosecuted.

Central to the Council's stance are "targeted detection orders" (TDOs). These orders, issued by national judicial or administrative authorities, compel specific hosting or interpersonal communication service providers to detect known CSAM (via hash matching) and, under stringent conditions, new CSAM. Crucially, these TDOs are not for general monitoring of private communications, but instead target uploaders and initial distributors, focusing on services deemed high-risk for the spread of new CSAM.

Significant safeguards for privacy and data protection are built in. The Council's position explicitly states that TDOs cannot mandate the scanning of end-to-end encrypted communications, nor can they require providers to weaken encryption. Certain sensitive services, like healthcare live chats, are also excluded from new CSAM detection.

Providers must report detected material to a new EU Centre for Child Sexual Abuse or national authorities. The regulation also covers moderation of CSA content and grooming. This agreement allows the Council to commence "trilogue" negotiations with the European Parliament and the Commission to finalize the legislation.

理事会立场的重点是“定向检测令”（TDOs）。这些命令由国家司法或行政机关发布，强制特定的托管或人际通信服务提供商检测已知的儿童性虐待材料（CSAM）（通过哈希匹配），并在严格的条件下检测新的CSAM。至关重要的是，这些TDOs并非用于普遍监控私人通信，而是针对上传者和初始分发者，重点关注被认为传播新CSAM高风险的服务。

其中内置了重要的隐私和数据保护保障措施。理事会的立场明确指出，TDOs不能强制扫描端到端加密通信，也不能要求服务提供商削弱加密。某些敏感服务，例如医疗保健在线聊天，也被排除在新CSAM检测范围之外。

服务提供商必须向新成立的欧盟儿童性虐待中心或国家机构报告检测到的材料。该法规还涵盖对CSA内容和诱骗行为的审核。该协议使得理事会能够与欧洲议会和欧盟委员会启动“三方对话”谈判，以最终确定立法。
